apps.title: Kango - student transportation
apps.description:
Safe rides for kids, from preschool to high school, 7 days a week. Kango - for students and families going places!

Kango helps families and schools get kids where they need to go:

● Schedule recurring rides to and from school
● Book a driver to take your daughter to ballet while you are on a business trip
● Set up a weekly ride to take your son and his three friends to soccer practice every Thursday
● Have a Kango driver take you and your toddler to preschool before you go to work
● And more!

With Kango, book rides from pre-screened drivers. All Kango drivers have at least 3 years of childcare experience, and have passed our comprehensive screening process (including fingerprinting, background checks and DMV checks) and training to ensure they can provide the best, safest service possible. You can even request your family's preferred drivers, or meet a driver in advance.

Kango serves CA - SF Bay Area, LA, San Fernando Valley, San Gabriel Valley, Modesto/Stockton/Merced, Oroville, Monterey, Salinas, Orange County, and San Diego and Arizona - Phoenix, Tucson, Casa Grande.

*****************************************
HOW KANGO WORKS

Kango gives you access to a trustworthy selection of pre-screened drivers. All you need to do is:

1. Schedule a ride
Kango supports one-time or recurring requests, and provides boosters or car seats as needed. Booking at least 24h in advance is recommended. Kango is the only service that accepts same-day requests as well, without a cut-off time.

2. See who can help
We’ll reach out to our pool of drivers in your area and find the best person to fulfill your request. You can request your preferred driver(s) or meet one ahead of time.

3. Stay in touch every step of the way
Enjoy real-time updates from your driver or track their location in the app. Or call them directly.


GET STARTED
Start using Kango today. When you’re ready to book a Kango driver, sign up and request what you need. Prices vary according to the type and duration of services required.

*****************************************
PRAISE FOR KANGO

FROM PARENTS:
“I chose to use Kango because it is the most convenient way to get around with a toddler. The drivers are screened and they have their own car seats which saves a lot of hassle.”
~Blanca

"I work full time so I thought I'd have to skip opportunities for my kids that are off site from school/after-school care...so finding out about Kango was great! My son, who is often tentative with new people and processes, is completely comfortable and enjoys the rides (and story times!) with the driver."
~Leah G.

FROM KANGO DRIVERS:
"I love being a part of the Kango family, especially driving the little ones ...I can interact directly with parents in the app and schedule my rides ahead of time. It's an app with a human touch."
~Stassa

“Having two teenage kids of my own, I drove my kids to school myself for years...I do this for Kango now and it puts a smile on my face. I'm grateful to be able to continue this very important work.”
~Lola


FROM THE PRESS:
"They say it takes a village to raise a child, but an app called Kango is bringing that idiom into the 21st century [… ] Kango is going to make parents' lives much easier."
--Business Insider

"Parents will like this app, but kids who used to get stuck waiting for a ride home will love it." --Techcrunch

apps.title: Valley Metro
apps.description:
The Valley Metro app is your tool for taking transit in the metro Phoenix area.
Smart Fare makes taking transit even easier – load your account, scan every time you ride and the more you ride, the more you save! You’ll never pay more than the Smart Fare daily, weekly and monthly fare.
Trip planning helps you get where you want to go with step-by-step navigation and real-time location for bus and light rail.

Features:
- Load your account and scan the QR code at the purple fare reader
- View your transaction history
- Set up autoload or load your account with cash at select retail locations
- Plan your trip with step-by-step navigation
- Locate your bus or train in real time
- Save your favorite stops and routes
- Get service alerts and account notifications

raw_data.releaseNotes:
- New deeplink support
- Performance updates and bug fixes

apps.title: TransmiSitp MoviliXa
apps.description:
TransmiSitp (MoviliXa Bogotá) searches for you the route with fewer stops to move between two stations of the Transmilenio and SITP system in Bogotá. With this application you can access information on each of the routes, including stations, buses, schedules, feeders and maps. Learn about the routes of the integrated Bogota public transport system (urban, complementary and special sitp) and see maps. Take advantage of GPS and maps to find the nearest station or recharge points for the Tullave card. We have made the greatest effort to allow the greatest number of functionalities to be used without the need for an Internet or data plan. If you have a device with NFC you can check the available balance on your card and the latest movements.

Calculate the Origin - Destination route to reach any place in the Transmilenio or SITP system with the least number of exchanges and the least number of transfer stops. You can choose the day and time on which you want to do the travel so you can plan your trip in advance. For each bus all schedules are displayed and active schedules are highlighted.

List of functionalities:
* Search for the best route given a station of origin and a destination. The search can be done by source location > destination, trunk lines, map, system map.
* Cost of the ticket for the Transmilenio and SITP system.
* Check the balance and history of the Tullave card (only for devices with NFC)
* Free transfer time measurement with alerts.
* Trunks of the Transmilenio system.
* Station search by word and proximity based on GPS information.
* Visualization of trunks and Transmilenio stations on the map.
* Search for buses, feeders and SITP.
* Measurement of speed and station location for the route of a bus.
* Route display with route map included.
* Integration with holiday calendar. Shows which buses are in operation at the time of the query according to the day.
* Search Tullave charging points by word and by proximity.
* Visualization of charging point on the map.
* General map of the interactive Transmilenio system.
* Mobility news.
* Tourist places with route calculation.

Do not hesitate to contact us if you have information about new routes or changes to existing routes. You can help us by sending us emails with this type of information or recommending us to your friends.

Terms and conditions: https://movilixa.com/eula-transmilenio-sitp/
Privacy policies: https://movilixa.com/politica-privacidad-transmilenio-sitp/

Note: We are an independent app. The information of the application is the public information that is destined for the users of the system, which is regulated by Colombian Law 1712 of 2014 and can be consulted from: https://gobiernodigital.mintic.gov.co/portal/Iniciativas/Datos-abiertos/

Our app uses the GTFS standard (https://developers.google.com/transit/gtfs). We consult the data in:
https://www.datos.gov.co/browse?q=transmilenio&sortBy=relevance
https://www.transmilenio.gov.co/ with the public information intended for the user that they publish in compliance with Colombian Law 1712 of 2014.

raw_data.releaseNotes:
Thank you for choosing us, update the App and find out what's new in this version:

* Routes update
* Minor adjustments and fixes

Remember that we are an independent initiative. We use public information from transportation systems.

https://www.transmilenio.gov.co/ with the public information intended for the user that they publish in compliance with Colombian Law 1712 of 2014.

apps.title: GoMini
apps.description:
The future of mobility is upon us, and a smart plan to alleviate traffic embraces ride sharing solutions include creating incentives to share a ride through mobile apps services and providing dynamically-routed shuttles that arrive when passenger call for trips that public transportation doesn't serve well. These options fill in our local transportation gaps for people who want to get around without a car. 



Which means we all should have a safe way to get from Point A to B with less hassle & decent ride .Now a days , the rise of on-demand ridesharing services has made hailing a private sedan, SUV, or taxi, GoMini app created a great advantage offers equal prices and high quality services with superior technology & moving forward for passenger benefits.



 



 



Is startup started out providing ride sharing private transportation to and from Egypt’s selective cities. Now, in addition round- town rides to and from October City & New Cairo rides, the app also will let you schedule your rides in advance, and a flat rate means you don’t have to worry about hidden fees and surcharges. Our service will remain less expensive than a taxi & the normal cost of a one-way journey.

GoMini operates 14-seat luxury shuttles with Wi-Fi and comfortable seating of the newest minibus.

GoMini route will be based on our passenger demand, with certain  stops points, that will make a flexible ride sharing for all passengers choices 

Offers; better Service, fewer stops, new vehicles, Superior technology, affordable, and eco-friendly option!



No matter any traveler needs, GoMini has versatile transportation solutions to fit every situation and budget!



Perfect for:



Students

Single Travelers

Business Traveler

Families

Groups

we make rides easy for you!

apps.title: DC Neighborhood Connect
apps.description:
Great value on demand travel when you need it, where you need it. Travel in comfort with just a few taps of your phone.
 
Just download the D.C. Neighborhood Connect app today, book your seat and go where you want, when you want. It is as easy as click, pay, go.
 
Our intelligent service allows passengers to share their journey with others going their way. Book a journey and our powerful algorithm matches you with a premium vehicle that will pick you up at a convenient spot. D.C. Neighborhood Connect, powered by Via, is a new model of on-demand transport - a technology-enabled vehicle that comes to a street corner near you, when and where you need it.
 
We serve many parts of Northeast D.C. and South East D.C. including Anacostia, Barry Farm, Congress Heights, Fort Totten, Michigan Park, Brookland, Edgewood, and Bloomingdale. Easily check our operating locations by opening the app!
 
How does D.C. Neighborhood Connect work?
- D.C. Neighborhood Connect is an on-demand travel concept that takes multiple passengers heading in the same direction and books them into a shared vehicle. Using the D.C. Neighborhood Connect app, input your address and we’ll match you with a vehicle going your way. We’ll pick you up on a nearby corner and drop you off close to your requested destination. Our smart algorithms provide journey times that are comparable to a taxi and much more convenient than other modes of travel.
 
How long will I wait?
- You'll always get an estimate of your pick-up ETA before booking. You can also track your ride in real time in the app.

How many passengers will I share a vehicle with?
- The number of passengers you will share a journey with varies based on capacity and your chosen destination! Our comfortable vans can easily accommodate up to 8 people.
 
Try this new on-demand transport app that is guaranteed to change the way that you think about travelling. We look forward to seeing you on your next journey. Just click, pay, go!
 
Love our app? Please rate us! Questions? Email us at dcneighborhoodconnect@districtcab.com

apps.title: Bustime: Transport online
apps.description:
Public transportation tracking in over 80 cities!

This is the official app of the website Bustime.ru. It tracks public transportation through the onboard GPS/GLONASS equipment. 

You receive estimated:
- departure time;
- travel time;
- arrival time.

ABSOLUTELY FREE

- Tracking of multiple public transit systems, such as buses, trolley-buses, tramways, shuttles (data availability varies)
- Easy to use interface with personalization options including: online map, schedules, bus stop search, routes, etc.
- Create your own or use existing color schemes, edit tile sizes - everything for your convenience and enjoyment!
- Automatically detect or manually assign favorites for the most frequently used routes.
- Multitracking of several approaching routes.
- Special features for impaired public, such as screen enhancement, voice notifications, low-floor/ADA accessibility markers.
- Open access chat line within each route and rating system for every crew based on public reviews.
- A thrilling game for those ones who is bored!

Application also features:
- fast operation;
- small size;
- tablet compatibility;
- friendly and helpful customer service.

Website: https://www.bustime.ru
News and updates in instagram: http://instagram.com/bustime.ru

Currently covers the following cities:

Where is the GPS data coming from? We cooperate with various government and municipal agencies in multiple cities.

How to express your concerns.
Please make sure to mention:
city
route

2. If a certain route has changed but it’s not reflected in the app, please mention:
website where the information is up to date
link to the news media or other source that shows before/after

3. If your city is not covered
please do not give us a one-star rating
let us know your local public transportation agency name, and we’ll contact them regarding data

If something isn’t right, use the same procedure:
Mention which city, which route, and what the problem is.

apps.title: The Official MTA App
apps.description:
The official all-in-one app for MTA’s subways, buses, and commuter railroads (Long Island Rail Road and Metro-North).

• A map-based interface that simplifies trip planning and makes getting around a breeze.
• Reliable real-time information from the MTA, with a new Status tab to quickly see on any service issues.
• Wondering where your bus is? Track it on the map in real-time and never miss a ride again.
• Easily save your frequently used lines, stops, and stations, and access them quickly for a hassle-free commute.
• Stay informed of any trip changes with optional alerts that notify you of delays or disruptions.
• Enjoy personalized smart alerts that learn your preferred trips and proactively check for service changes before you leave.
• Check live departures and service status across the MTA network right from your home screen with interactive widgets.

The MTA app is built for our riders, with our riders. We update the app regularly based on your feedback.

raw_data.releaseNotes:
This release contains enhancements and improvements, including:
• Address search results now open directly in the Explore All tab with nearby options, making it easier to discover transit options around you.
• Improvements to the departure times widget: enlarging the refresh button tap area and fixing issues with the manual refresh
• Various bug fixes and performance enhancements for a smoother experience
Thank you for riding with us.

apps.title: maxim: order a taxi & delivery
apps.description:
The best way to appreciate the convenience of our app is to download it and start using it to order a taxi and other transport. Rates vary. Ride to the railway station, airport, or another city. Pay by cash or card. Enjoy discounts and promo codes.
Since 2003, we’ve been developing innovative taxi ordering technologies, making our service more modern, affordable, and safe. Our service is helping millions of people save money as they commute and travel.

Price
If you need a cheap taxi every day, choose our Economy rate. If you value comfort, opt for the Comfort rate. We also have minivans, buses, and trucks. You can order a delivery of food, household cleaning products and other goods or medicine from shops and drugstores.
You can see your ride price before tapping the Order button, which is useful for planning your budget. Don’t worry about traffic – you only pay extra for additional services that were not specified in the order.
Enjoy the convenience of paying for rides with cash and a credit card. You can use a personal account that you refill whenever necessary for corporate or family rides.
It’s easy to get discounted rides if you use a promo code or you are one of our regular clients.

Order
You can order a ride by filling in the From and To address fields or using a city map. You can also use your smartphone’s or tablet’s location services.
A scheduled order helps you plan your rides for a convenient time.
You can provide special requests for your ride to arrange any necessary additional services: specify information about children, pets, or luggage; or add another phone number to order a taxi for someone else from your phone.
A driver can buy goods, medicine or groceries, and deliver them to your place.
Launch our app on Wear OS smart watch to track your ride status.
View a map to see available cars and your driver’s movement as he or she approaches your location.
You can share your location while you are en route. This is an important feature for parents who want to know their children are safe.
Leaving a ride rating affects the driver’s rating and helps us improve our service.

Countries
Argentina, Azerbaijan, Bangladesh, Brazil, Cambodia, Colombia, Dominican Republic, Indonesia, Kazakhstan, Kyrgyzstan, Laos, Malaysia, Peru, Philippines, South Africa, Tajikistan, Tanzania, Thailand, Uzbekistan, Vanuatu, Vietnam

raw_data.releaseNotes:
- Improvements and fixes 
- The app runs faster now

apps.title: SporTran OnDemand
apps.description:
SporTran OnDemand

With input from the community, we’ve created a public transit alternative – SporTran OnDemand! OnDemand offers a direct route from designated OnDemand stop to OnDemand stop for riders in one of the OnDemand locations/zones. Arrive in style in one of our Dodge Caravans or Chevy Malibu and Dodge Challenger sedans. OnDemand has replaced our former LiftLine service, providing direct transport for those in need of Paratransit (ADA) accessibility. Our OnDemand paratransit vans are specially equipped with wheelchair lifts/ramps and other accessibility features that allow maximum mobility for customers with disabilities.



How is OnDemand different than fixed-route bus service?

· OnDemand provides faster service for the OnDemand locations listed below, bypassing the stops and hubs riders don’t need. 



· OnDemand is being rolled out in phases. We will update the list as we bring new zones into the OnDemand service area.



· OnDemand is an opportunity to build rural connectivity. For citizens in outlying areas without access to a standard bus line, OnDemand can get you to one of our hubs, and then connect you to a variety of locations.



·  The best part? OnDemand fares are FREE!



SporTran traces its history to the 1870's when mule drawn street cars ran from the downtown area to nearby outlying areas. Today, SporTran sports a fleet of over 95 modern heavy duty and smaller cutaway buses equipped to handle all passengers, including those with disabilities. Our buses are powered by the latest emission reduction systems such as Compressed Natural Gas (CNG) and 100% Battery Electric Technology.

Beginning in 2022, all SporTran and SporTran OnDemand rides are Zero Fare! Passengers pay nothing for their trips.

apps.title: 9292 travel planner + e-ticket
apps.description:
9292 combines all timetables for train, bus, tram, metro, and ferry of all public transport operators in the Netherlands in one app. Plan your journey, buy an e-ticket, track the vehicle with live locations, and stay up-to-date on the latest changes – everything for your journey from A to B. The journey planner provides you with the fatest travel advice based on real-time information from NS, Arriva, Breng, Connexxion, EBS, GVB, Hermes, HTM, Keolis, Qbuzz, RRReis, RET, Syntus, U-OV, Waterbus, and more. With the 9292 app you have all public transport information at your fingertips. In the event of construction work or cancellations, the app automatically provides alternative travel advice.

Why 9292?
• Personalise your journey from A to B
• Real-time information in one app from 10+ public transport operators (incl. Flex-OV)
• Rated 4.5
• The expert in public transport information for 30+ years
• 5+ million users

E-ticket for your entire journey:
• No OV-chipkaart or debit card required during your trip
• Direct overview of travel expenses
• Pay with iDeal, creditcard, or Apple Pay
• Open gates with the QR-code

Useful features:
• Personalise your home screen: Add your favorite locations and routes to your home screen by using the plus sign. Generate a travel advice with just one click.
• Plan from the map or ‘current location’: Don't know the address of your start or end point? Or are you traveling to a place without an address, such as a location in a park? Simply choose your point on the map, or use GPS to plan from or to your 'current location'.
• Departure times: View real-time departure times of a stop or station via the menu.
• Live locations: View the live location of the train, bus, tram, or metro via the map icon in your travel advice.
• Crowd expectation: View the expected occupancy per mode of transport in your travel advice.
• Save travel advice: Save your travel advice via the plus sign in the top right corner of the travel advice. You can find your saved travel advice via the menu.
• Start or end your journey by bike or scooter: Plan your journey and indicate whether you want to walk, cycle, or travel by scooter at the start or end of your journey via ‘Options’. You can also opt for an electric bike or shared bike. The planner automatically shows available rental locations nearby.
• Rent and view shared mobility: Find all rental locations of OV-fiets, Dott, Donkey Republic, Lime, Check, and Felyx via the menu. Are you travelling by Donkey Republic shared bike in cities such as Amsterdam, Rotterdam, or The Hague? Rent it directly via the 9292 app!
• Music for during your journey: Click on the button ‘Playlist for this journey’ at the bottom of the travel advice. Log in to your Spotify account and receive a playlist based on the length of your journey.

Feedback and customer service:
We are continuously working on new features to improve your public transport travel experience. Do you have any questions, tips or other feedback? Please contact our customer service:
• Do you have a question, remark, or problem? Chat with us via Instagram, Facebook, or Whatsapp. During the week and on public holidays from 08:00 to 20:00, on weekends from 09:00 to 18:00. Or send an e-mail to reizigers@9292.nl
• Questions about travel advice or price advice? Call 0900-9292 (only available if you are calling from within the Netherlands). On weekdays from 07:30 to 19:00, on weekends and public holidays from 10:00 to 16:00. Not in the Netherlands? Send an e-mail to reizigers@9292.nl, or contact us via social media.
• Questions about e-tickets? Send an e-mail to ticketing@reizigers.nl

- Bugfixes: The app has become more stable

apps.title: MTD Access
apps.description:
MTD Access is a service provided by the Champaign-Urbana Mass Transit District for passengers with disabilities who are unable to reasonably access the fixed-route bus service.
Complementary paratransit is an origin-to-destination service operated in wheelchair lift-equipped vans. Operators of MTD Access are able to provide additional assistance to help passengers access the service.
MTD Access is available within three-quarters of a mile of a fixed-route bus stop. Both the starting and ending points of a trip must be within that three-quarters of a mile.

With MTD Access, passengers will be able to update their contact information, track their vehicle as it approaches, and review upcoming trip information.

To sign up for MTD Access, visit mtd.org or call 217.384.8188 to get more information about the application process.

apps.title: Pierce Transit Runner
apps.description:
Pierce Transit On-Demand makes it easier than ever to ride transit in Pierce County — with one simple smartphone app and just a few taps, book a ride within our Runner zones wherever the bus can’t take you. To provide the fastest service, we may pair you with others headed in a similar direction.
 
HOW IT WORKS:
- Download the app and create an account.
- Get picked up and dropped off where you want.
- Share your ride with others.
- Save cash and time.
 
 
What we’re about:

CONVENIENT
Use your phone to tell Pierce Transit Runner where you are and where you want to go. We’ll take you there. To provide faster service, you’ll be paired with others heading in a similar direction.

FAST
It just takes a minute to book your ride! The app will send you an approximate arrival time for your Pierce Transit Runner vehicle.

AFFORDABLE
Pierce Transit Runner costs the same as a bus trip, and daily and 30-day passes are accepted. Pay your fare using ORCA, Transit app on your smartphone, or a paper pass. To pay using cash, visit one of the many ORCA retail locations or vending machines to convert your cash to E-Purse value. For more information on buying or using an ORCA card, visit myorca.com.
 

SUSTAINABLE.
Sharing rides reduces the number of vehicles on the roads, bringing down congestion and CO2 emissions. You can even double up your green cred by connecting with other public transit services. With a couple of taps, you get to do your part to make your city a little bit greener and cleaner, every time you ride.
 

Questions? Reach out to support-pierce@ridewithvia.com
Loving your experience so far? Give us a 5-star rating. You’ll have our eternal gratitude.

apps.title: Hemam: Disabled Transport App
apps.developer: COMPANY KIAN RAHLA LOTGUNIYA MAALOUMAT MASSAHMA MAQFILA
apps.description:
Hemam: A Saudi app dedicated to providing medical transportation services for people of disabilities and the elderly in Riyadh, featuring easy booking and professional drivers.

• *What does Hemam offer?*
- High-quality medical transportation services tailored to the needs of people of determination and the elderly.
- Quick and easy online booking for trips.
- 24/7 support to address customer inquiries and needs.
- Ensures passenger safety through carefully selected and thoroughly trained drivers.
- Utilizes a rating system to guarantee the best possible service.

• *How to use the Hemam app:*
1. Open the Hemam app on your phone.
2. Select your current location and desired destination.
3. Track your journey through the app.
4. At the end of the trip, rate your experience and the driver.

• *Why choose Hemam?*
- Provides reliable medical transportation services within and beyond Riyadh.
- Prioritizes customer needs and offers a comfortable and safe experience.
- Offers 24/7 medical transportation services for both short and long distances.

• *For more information:*
If you have any inquiries, you can contact us via email: info@kaiian.com

apps.title: SEPTA
apps.description:
SEPTA’s mobile app empowers riders to plan their trip end to end. Find stops and stations nearby, plan a trip, access real-time information, manage your SEPTA Key Card, and more!

Improved performance and user experience
- A more intuitive experience, now at faster speeds.

Think ahead with the new Trip Planner
- Plan your next ride without leaving the app.

Get all of the Station Details
- View station-specific alerts and schedules.

Easily load up your SEPTA Key
- Add funds and manage your SEPTA Key from the app.

Get to know SEPTA Metro!
- New letters and colors for our Metro lines fully integrated into the app.

Stay in the know with Real-time Info
- Get to-the-minute updates about upcoming routes.

Find the closest stop with Nearby
- Easily view (and favorite) nearby stations and routes.

Get assistance from your pocket with Help
- Report a concern or contact SEPTA straight rom the app.

Improved features for riders with accessibility needs
- Including full screen reader compatibility.

apps.title: VoRide by Votran
apps.description:
Give VoRide a try!

How does it work?
VoRide is a microtransit service that provides on-demand rides for people in Volusia County. 

To reserve your ride: 
Request a ride departing from your current location
Enter your destination
Get picked up by a VoRide van

How long will I wait?
Wait times vary. Track your reserved vehicle in real-time using the VoRide app.
 
What we’re about:

SHARED.
Our algorithm matches people headed in the same direction. This means you’re getting the convenience and comfort of a private ride with the efficiency, speed, and affordability of a public one.
 
AFFORDABLE.
Aggregating people into one vehicle brings down prices. Enough said. 
 
SUSTAINABLE.
Sharing rides reduces the number of vehicles on the roads, bringing down congestion and CO2 emissions. With a couple of taps, you get to do your part to make your community a little bit greener and cleaner, every time you ride.
 
Questions? Reach out at support-voride@ridewithvia.com or give us a call +1 386-210-9861 . Loving your experience so far? Throw us a 5-star rating. You’ll have our eternal gratitude.

apps.title: Birmingham On-Demand
apps.description:
Birmingham On-Demand is an affordable shared ride service that gets you just about anywhere in the center and east side of the city from morning to night.

HOW IT WORKS:
- Download the app and create an account.
- Book an on-demand ride on your phone.
- Meet your driver on a nearby corner.

CONVENIENT
Use your phone to tell Birmingham On-Demand where you are and where you want to go. You'll receive a nearby pick-up location for a Birmingham On-Demand vehicle only a short walk away.

FAST
It just takes a minute to book your ride! The app will send you an approximate arrival time for your Birmingham On-Demand vehicle.

AFFORDABLE
Birmingham On-Demand is a low cost, public transit option. Pay easily with a credit/debit card through the app!

Questions? Reach out at support-bhm@ridewithvia.com 

Loving your experience so far? Throw us a 5-star rating. You'll have our eternal gratitude.

apps.title: Via Driver
apps.description:
Download the app and sign up today to start earning!

OWN YOUR SCHEDULE 
Choose when and how much you want to drive. 

PREDICTABLE EARNINGS
Say goodbye to guesswork. We’ll send you hourly rates — and special promos — in advance, so you can plan ahead. 

ACCESS TO 24/7 SUPPORT
You’re not on the road alone — Via’s Live Support team offers 24/7 assistance, and you’ll be connected with a real person, too.

SMARTER, SEAMLESS EXPERIENCE
We take people where they need to go in the most efficient way possible, and riders are picked up on nearby corners — which means fewer unnecessary detours. 

Don’t have an account yet? Download the app and click on “sign up”. Qualified drivers will be invited to complete their registration and get on the road with Via!

Want to ride instead? Download the Via Rider app.

Notes:
The Via Driver app required up to 2GB of data per month.
As the app provides navigation services, it is essential for the GPS to run in the background while you are driving with Via in order to provide continuous navigation.

apps.title: Salem Skipper
apps.description:
Salem Skipper makes it easier than ever to move around the city of Salem, MA — with a few taps, book a ride using the app and we’ll pair you with others headed your way. No detours, no delays.

What we’re about:
SHARED.
Our tech matches people headed in the same direction. This means you’re getting the convenience and comfort of a private ride with the efficiency, speed, and affordability of a public one.

SUSTAINABLE.
Sharing rides reduces the number of vehicles on the roads, bringing down congestion and CO2 emissions. With a couple of taps, you get to do your part to make your city a little bit greener and cleaner, every time you ride.

AFFORDABLE
Rides are priced comparable to public transport and there are additional discounts for passengers who qualify. Head to salemskipper.com for more information. 

How does Salem Skipper work?
- Salem Skipper is an on-demand travel concept that takes multiple passengers heading in the same direction and books them into a shared vehicle. Using the Salem Skipper app, input your address and we’ll match you with a vehicle going your way. We’ll pick you up on a nearby corner and drop you off within a short walk of your chosen destination. Now for the clever bit; our algorithms provide journey times that are comparable to a taxi and much more convenient than other modes of travel, making public transportation easier than ever before! 

 How long will I wait
- You'll always get an accurate estimate of your pick-up ETA before booking. - You can also track your bus in real time using the app.

Questions? Head to salemskipper.com or reach out at support-
salem@ridewithvia.com.
Loving your experience so far? Give us a 5-star rating.

apps.title: Transport Tycoon
apps.description:
Build the ultimate transport empire!

Take control of your own fledgling transport company, and use your engineering skill and business acumen to keep cargo and passengers moving - and keep the money rolling in!

Transport Tycoon contains everything that made the original PC game an all-time classic, plus a whole host of brilliant new features - bigger, richer worlds, deeper simulation and a huge variety of land, sea and air vehicles. The intuitive new touch screen interface makes it easier than ever to build and maintain your transport network.

Whether you're planning and constructing ambitious engineering projects, or simply exploring the intricately simulated workings of the game's world, Transport Tycoon is your ticket to many hours of absorbing and rewarding entertainment.

TRANSPORT TYCOON is the definitive version of the classic simulation game, created by 31x and Origin8 Technologies in collaboration with Chris Sawyer, the original designer and developer of the TRANSPORT TYCOON and ROLLERCOASTER TYCOON franchises.

 BUILD

 • Deploy bus and tram networks to grow sleepy towns into bustling cities.
 • Lay cross-country railroads to keep industries supplied with precious resources. 
 • Construct massive bridges, dig tunnels and deploy earth-moving tools to carve a path through mountainous terrain.
 • Build air and sea ports to transport cargo and passengers further and faster in an accelerating world.

 EXPLORE
   
 • A wide range of beautiful landscapes including deserts, forests, mountains, valleys and islands.
 • Several ‘real-world’ scenarios modelled on regions of North America and Europe at different periods in the 20th century.
 • A richly simulated world with changing seasons and working industries, farms and towns.
 • An all-new interface puts everything you need to explore and interact with the world at your fingertips.

 DESIGN

 • Over 150 vehicle types allowing you to choose the ideal transport solution for every situation.
 • Use railway junctions and signals to allow multiple trains to share your rail routes.
 • Modify vehicles and stations and assign new routes to adapt your business in real time.
 • Upgrade and replace old vehicles as new and better ones are invented – all the way to supersonic jets and bullet trains!
  
 COMPETE

 • Play through 49 scenarios expertly designed to suit all skill levels and playing styles.
 • Try to stay one step ahead of advanced A.I.-driven competitor's companies. 
 • Track your progress and troubleshoot your business with in-depth company statistics.
 • Prove yourself worthy of the title of Transport Tycoon and take on the life-consuming 100 Year Challenges!


Like Transport Tycoon on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/tycoonsim
Follow Transport Tycoon on Twitter: @TransportTycoon

WWW.TRANSPORTTYCOON.COM

Transport Tycoon © 1994, 2013 31X Ltd. Created by Chris Sawyer. Transport Tycoon ® 31X Ltd. All rights reserved.

Transport Tycoon is a Universal App compatible with iPhone 4 and newer, iPod touch 4th generation and newer, and iPad 2 and newer including iPad Mini. iOS 6.0 or above recommended.

All content and features are included with no additional purchases required.

- Fix for spanish language that affected some devices
- Fix for some crashes and other issues

apps.title: Palo Alto Link
apps.description:
Palo Alto Link is the city’s easy, affordable, and eco-friendly service. We are a rideshare service that comes when you want, where you want — give us your pickup and dropoff addresses, and we’ll provide a few ride options. Choose the ride option that works best for you and get directions to a nearby intersection where a driver will pick you up.
 
How it works:
- Book a ride on your phone.
- Get picked up on a nearby corner.
- Share your ride with others 

What we’re about:

SHARED.
Our corner-to-corner algorithm matches people headed in the same direction. Aggregating people into one vehicle brings down prices and lowers CO2 emissions. Enough said. 

SUSTAINABLE.
Sharing rides reduces the number of vehicles on the roads, bringing down congestion and CO2 emissions. On top of this,  our vehicle fleet is a mix of hybrid and fully electric vehicles. With a couple of taps, you get to do your part to make your city a little bit greener and cleaner, every time you ride. 

Questions? Reach out at support-pal@ridewithvia.com. Loving your experience so far? Throw us a 5-star rating. You’ll have our eternal gratitude.

apps.title: NYU Safe Ride
apps.description:
Think of NYU Safe Ride as your safe alternative to get to and from home.

Book an on-demand ride on the app and our technology will find you a ride home.  We will pair you with other people headed your way. No detours, no delays.
 
How it works:
- Use the app to book rides to and from points on the map.
- Get picked up at your door.
- Share your ride with others.
- Save time and reduce carbon emissions. 

What we’re about:
SHARED.
Our algorithm matches people headed in the same direction. This means you’re getting the convenience and comfort of a private ride with the efficiency of a shared one.

SUSTAINABLE.
Sharing rides reduces the number of vehicles on the roads, bringing down congestion and CO2 emissions. With a couple of taps, you get to do your part to make your city a little bit greener and cleaner, every time you ride. 

FREE
Rides are totally free. Enough said.

SAFETY
Safe Ride provides you with a safe alternative to walking to/from home by yourself late at night. 

Loving your experience so far? Throw us a 5-star rating. You’ll have our eternal gratitude.

apps.title: Hele-On Kako‘o Paratransit
apps.description:
Hele-On Kako‘o Paratransit is a service provided by the Hawai'i County Mass Transit Agency for passengers with disabilities who are unable to reasonably access the fixed-route bus service. Complementary paratransit is an origin-to-destination service operated in wheelchair lift-equipped vans. Operators are able to provide additional assistance to help passengers access the service. Hele-On Kako‘o Paratransit is available within three-quarters of a mile of a fixed-route bus stop.

With Hele-On PT, passengers will be able to book rides, update their contact information, track their vehicle as it approaches, and review upcoming trip information. It will also be possible to cancel rides as needed directly from the app.

To sign up for the service, visit the Hele-On website or call 808-640-1020 to get more information about the application process. You can also visit the website for more information about the service hours.

apps.title: Fil Bleu Résabus
apps.description:
Réservez en ligne depuis l’application ou le site filbleu.fr, ou par téléphone au 02 47 66 70 70
 
Résabus, c’est plein d’avantages !
Souple : je choisis mon horaire et j'effectue mes réservations de 3 semaines à 30 minutes avant le départ
Economique : je voyage au tarif Fil Bleu en vigueur
Simple : l’appli me permet de gérer mes réservations, annulations, et suivre mon véhicule en temps réel
Rapide : un véhicule me conduit à destination en optimisant le temps de trajet en fonction de la circulation
Proche : l'application vous proposera un véhicule qui viendra vous chercher à un arrêt proche de votre adresse.
Écologique : Résabus me permet de partager un trajet avec d'autres passagers
 
Comment fonctionne le service Résabus ?
Vous pouvez profiter du service en réservant vos trajets de 3 semaines à 30 minutes avant le départ. Indiquez simplement votre lieu de départ / ou votre arrêt et l'heure, avec votre destination. Résabus vous proposera le trajet optimal en fonction de votre demande et des réservations effectuées par d'autres passagers. 
Nouveau sur Résabus: vous pouvez désormais suivre votre véhicule en temps réel dans l'application et sur le site Web. De plus, vous recevrez une confirmation de réservation par SMS ou par notification.
 
Nous espérons vous voir bientôt dans l'un de nos véhicules !

raw_data.releaseNotes: Cette version inclut des améliorations de performances et une expérience de réservation revisitée.

apps.title: RegioFlink
apps.description:
RegioFlink 
RegioFlink by Verkehrsverbund Tirol (VVT) offers a new and sustainable on-demand shuttle service in Tyrol! 

According to the motto "Ordered and picked up" you can travel even more flexibly with our shuttle RegioFlink.

From the train station to the village center, from the pharmacy to the supermarket and most certainly almost to your home. 

Download the RegioFlink app and try our RegioFlink right away on your next trip. We look forward to seeing you!

Where is RegioFlink in use?
- Tyrol
- For more information please see here www.vvt.at/regioflink

How does RegioFlink work?
- RegioFlink is an on-demand public mobility service that drives several passengers who travel in the same direction at the same time. 
Simply download the RegioFlink app, register and off you go.
Enter your address in the RegioFlink app and we'll find you a vehicle going in your direction. 
We'll pick you up at a nearby stop and take you to a stop in short walking distance from your chosen destination. 
How much does a ride with RegioFlink cost?
For detailed information about prices and discounts (families, seniors, etc.) please see here www.vvt.at/regioflink. 

RegioFlink operating hours
- You can find the local operating hours of RegioFlink here www.vvt.at/regioflink

How long will I have to wait?
- So that you don't have to wait long, the RegioFlink app always informs you about the expected pick-up time before you book.
- You can also track your RegioFlink in real time via the app.

How many passengers do I share a vehicle with?
- In general there can be as many people shuttled as seats are available.

*You can find more information at: www.vvt.at/regioflink
Any questions? Send us an email at info@vvt.at or call us at +43 512 56 16 16.
Do you like our app? Please rate us!

apps.title: Valdosta On-Demand
apps.description:
The Valdosta On-Demand app makes it easier than ever to move around the city of Valdosta, GA — with a few taps, book a ride using the app and we’ll pair you with others headed your way. No detours, no delays.
 
What we’re about:
SHARED.
Our tech matches people headed in the same direction. This means you’re getting the convenience and comfort of a private ride with the efficiency, speed, and affordability of a public one.
 
SUSTAINABLE.
Sharing rides reduces the number of vehicles on the roads, bringing down congestion and CO2 emissions. With a couple of taps, you get to do your part to make your city a little bit greener and cleaner, every time you ride.
 
AFFORDABLE
Rides are priced comparable to public transport and you can add people to your bookings for even less. Head to valdostaondemand.com for more information.


How does Valdosta On-Demand work?
- Valdosta On-Demand is an on-demand travel concept that takes multiple passengers heading in the same direction and books them into a shared vehicle. Using the Valdosta On-Demand app, input your address and we’ll match you with a vehicle going your way. We’ll pick you up on a nearby corner and drop you off within a short walk of your chosen destination. Now for the clever bit; our algorithms provide journey times that are comparable to a taxi and much more convenient than other modes of travel, making public transportation easier than ever before! 

How long will I wait
- You'll always get an accurate estimate of your pick-up ETA before booking.
- You can also track your bus in real time using the app.
 
Questions? Head to valdostaondemand.com or reach out at support-valdosta@ridewithvia.com.
Loving your experience so far? Give us a 5-star rating.

apps.title: NaviGator for Gainesville RTS
apps.description:
Introducing NaviGator – the easiest way to track your bus, find routes, and more.

Features:

Favorite Stops
Save your most frequently visited stops to quickly check when the next bus is coming.

Real-Time Map
View real-time location information, which is taken directly from GPS devices on your bus.

Trip Planner
Get step-by-step transit directions with live guidance provided by Apple Maps.

Notifications
Set arrival notifications so you're prepared and never miss the bus again.

**Please note: NaviGator is only compatible with the Gainesville Regional Transit System (RTS) and UF Campus Connector.**

NaviGator is not affiliated with or endorsed by the City of Gainesville, the Regional Transit System, or the University of Florida.

apps.title: Probus Rome - Atac Transport
apps.description:
You are in Rome and you need to know when the next bus is coming ? or find the nearest bus stop ? or what is the bus route of a line ?
 Probus Rome is the leading iOs application that answers to these questions.

Probus Rome allows you to:

• easily have realtime waiting times at your finger tips 
• manage your favourite geolocalized bus stop list 
• plan your journey with the public transport (bus, underground, train)
 • show bus route maps and connections
 • search for nearby Atac bus stops
 • show departure timetables
• see live travel news
 • see realtime tweets from RomaMobilità and InfoAtac
Features:
• easy and simple user interface
 • favourite stops list at your finger tips
 • over 8600 searchable Atac stops in Rome
 • GPS for a better data accuracy
 • essential day-to-day application for locals,students,tourists for the public local transportation use. 
• constantly updated,developed and improved
 • attention and care to user requests

WARNING:
Probus Rome requires an Internet connection to retrieve the realtime bus waiting times and journey planner.
Probus Rome is an unofficial application and uses datas provided by muoversiaroma.it (Roma Servizi per la Mobilità) and is not responsible at all of the accuracy of waiting times and journey planner results.
Data source: ATAC, Roma Mobilità ( ATAC Autobus, Bus Roma, ATAC Metropolitana, Metro Roma)
For bug or suggestions do not hesitate to email to iprobus.rm@gmail.com. 
Each report will be carefully considered to improve Probus Rome in every aspects.

apps.title: Vipi Transport
apps.description:
Vipi Transport is a smart logistics and mobility platform built to transform how goods and commercial vehicles move across the world.

We connect clients with trusted transporters for on-demand bookings, while also offering a vehicle rental service for flexible short- or long-term use. Through our marketplace, users can buy and sell commercial vehicles, and access a pool of verified professional drivers for hire.

Our mission is to eliminate wasted vehicle space, improve logistics efficiency, and empower transport entrepreneurs through technology. Whether you're looking to move goods, rent a vehicle, sell or buy a truck, or find a reliable driver—Vipi Transport is your one-stop platform for commercial mobility solutions.

Terms & Conditions: https://vipitransport.com/terms-and-conditions
Privacy Policy: https://sites.google.com/view/vipitransport-privacy-policy/privacy_policy_en
Refund Policy: https://vipitransport.com/refund-and-cancellation-policy

apps.title: Palm Tran Go Glades
apps.description:
Palm Tran’s Go Glades service provides curb-to-curb, on-demand shared transportation in the Glades!
Connect to Palm Tran’s fixed route bus service, shop, work, learn and play. Go Glades is a ridesharing service that’s convenient, easy and affordable.
 
The Go Glades app makes it easier than ever to get where you need to go — with a few taps,
book a ride using the app and Palm Tran will match you with a vehicle going your way.
 
What does on-demand mean?
It means you can get a ride when you need it, in real-time. You don’t have to schedule your ride in advance.
 
How does Go Glades work?
Start by downloading the Palm Tran Go Glades app, then create an account using your name, phone number and email address. Confirm your location and input your destination to see the ride options. Then, book your ride and track it in real time.
 
Questions? Head to https://www.palmtran.org/go-glades/ or call 561-649-9838. 
Loving your experience so far? Give us a 5-star rating.

raw_data.description:
Palm Tran’s Go Glades service provides curb-to-curb, on-demand shared transportation in the Glades!
Connect to Palm Tran’s fixed route bus service, shop, work, learn and play. Go Glades is a ridesharing service that’s convenient, easy and affordable.
 
The Go Glades app makes it easier than ever to get where you need to go — with a few taps,
book a ride using the app and Palm Tran will match you with a vehicle going your way.
 
What does on-demand mean?
It means you can get a ride when you need it, in real-time. You don’t have to schedule your ride in advance.
 
How does Go Glades work?
Start by downloading the Palm Tran Go Glades app, then create an account using your name, phone number and email address. Confirm your location and input your destination to see the ride options. Then, book your ride and track it in real time.
 
Questions? Head to https://www.palmtran.org/go-glades/ or call 561-649-9838. 
Loving your experience so far? Give us a 5-star rating.

apps.title: אוטובוס קרוב - Bus Nearby
apps.description:
Bus Nearby locates bus stops near you and shows accurate departure time of routes passing by. Using the search functionality of the app you can also also locate line information, stations , Rav-kav top-up locations and navigation directions using public transportation in Israel. English is fully supported on both interface and transit information.  Real time schedule updates and navigation information is available from all the Israeli public transportation agencies: Israel Railways , Egged , Egged Taavura , Dan , Dan Badarom , Dan Beer-Sheva , Kavim , Metropoline ,  Superbus , Tnufa,  Elektra-Afikim , Extra m Nativ Express , Beit Shemesh Express , Nazareth Transport & Tourism , UNBS , GB Tours , Galim , Golan , Eilot , Metronit Carmelit & Rachbalit in Haifa ,Tel-Aviv area weekend bus service, Kfir - Jerusalem Light rail, Dankal - Tel Aviv's light rail, East Jerusalem bus companies & Shared Taxis (Sherut)

If you like the app, please support us by subscribing to Bus Nearby Premium Free of Ads:
Subscription price is 7.90 ILS for a period of 3 Month
Prices may vary by location.
If you choose to upgrade to a Premium subscription, payment will be charged to your iTunes account at confirmation of purchase. Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period. Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period. Auto-renewal may be turned off at any time by going to your settings in the iTunes Store after purchase.

Terms of Use & Privacy Policy: https://busnear.by/static/busnearby-eula-privacypolicy.pdf

אוטובוס קרוב - אפליקציית התחבורה הציבורית המתקדמת והמדוייקת בישראל

תכונות עיקריות: איתור רכבות , קווי אוטובוס ותחנות , זמני אוטובוסים מדוייקים מבוססי ג'יפיאס ומיקומי אוטובוסים מעודכנים על המפה בזמן אמת , תכנון מסלול והוראות ניווט בתחבורה ציבורית , עמדות טעינת רב-קו , מצב מועדפים חסכוני בסוללה לסינון מהיר של המידע , תמיכה מלאה בשפות עברית , ערבית ואנגלית.

איך זה עובד?
האפליקציה תאתר את תחנות האוטובוסים בסביבתכם ותציג את זמני ההגעה הקרובים של הקווים. לא מצאתם את התחנה או הקו שלכם? השתמשו בחיפוש (לחיצה על זכוכית המגדלת בחלקו העליון של המסך)
במסך החיפוש תוכלו גם לחפש מסלולי הגעה מנקודה לנקודה וניווט באמצעות תחבורה ציבורית.  

בחירת קו במסך הראשי או דרך החיפוש תיקח אתכם למסך הקווים שם תוכלו לגלות בדיוק איפה האוטובוס על המפה ולקבל מידע מפורט על מסלול ותחנות הקו, לוחות זמנים לכל תחנה, כיווני נסיעה וחלופות, ומיקום בזמן אמת של האוטובוסים לאורך הקו

באוטובוס קרוב תוכלו למצוא מידע מקיף ומעודכן על קווי התחבורה הציבורית, קווי התלמידים וקווי הלילה של אגד , אגד תעבורה , רכבת ישראל , דן , דן בדרום ,  דן באר-שבע , קווים , מטרופולין , סופרבוס , אלקטרה אפיקים , נתיב אקספרס , נסיעות ותיירות נצרת , שירותי אוטובוס מאוחדים (ש.א.מ) , ג‘יבי טורס , גלים , גולן , אילות, מטרונית , כרמלית , רכבלית ,  רב-קווית מוניות שירות , נעים בסופש סבבוס וקווי החוף - תחבורת סוף השבוע של איזור המרכז, כפיר מפעילת הרכבת הקלה בירושלים ומפעילי התחבורה הציבורית במזרח ירושלים.

האפליקציה כוללת סורק כרטיסי רב-קו מובנה אשר ייתן לכם מידע מקיף על יתרת ערך צבור ותוקף הכרטיסים המוטענים על גבי הכרטיס. אם נגמר לכם הכסף או המנוי ואתם צריכים טעינה תוכלו למצוא על המפה באפליקציה את בתי העסק שתוכלו לטעון בהם כרטיסי רב קו במזומן ואשראי.

זמני הגעת הקווים המופיעים באפליקציה בצבע ירוק הינם זמני אמת המבוססים על איכון מכשירי הג'י.פי.אס המותקנים באוטובוסים. זמנים בצבע שחור מבוססים על לוח זמנים מתוכנן של נסיעות עתידיות או שאין לגביהן מידע זמן אמת.

למידע נוסף ותמיכה אתם מוזמנים ליצור איתנו קשר באינסטגרם , פייסבוק ובאימייל דרך התפריט במסך הראשי של האפליקציה

חדש! מנוי לאוטובוס קרוב ללא פרסומות בעלות של 7.90 ש"ח ל-3 חודשים.
העלות עשויה להשתנות לפי מדינה ומטבע התשלום.
התשלום יחוייב מחשבון האייטיונס לאחר אישור הרכישה. המנוי יתחדש באופן אוטומטי אלא אם בוטל החידוש לפחות 24 שעות לפני סוף התקופה. החשבון יחוייב שוב 24 שעות לפני תום התקופה הנוכחית. ניתן לבטל את החידוש האוטומטי דרך הגדרות חשבון המשתמש בחשבון האייטיונס.

apps.title: Delux Transportation
apps.description:
Mobile App to book and manage Delux Transportation reservations. 

It doesn't matter if your reservations were booked over the phone, on-line or via your mobile device, Delux Transportation app allows you to manage all your ground transportation needs right from your phone or tablet. 

Key features include: 
• Easy reservations for now or future travel 
• GPS based, recent addresses used or Airport reservations 
• Book for yourself or others 
• Easy edit or cancellation of reservations 
• Instant status updates 
• Driver location and ETA 
• Corporate and personal payment management 
And much more...

apps.title: Trip Connect Johnson County
apps.description:
We make accessing employment and education within Johnson County, IA affordable, easy and efficient!

Trip Connect is a convenient, curb-to-curb transportation service operated by NTS Horizons, a Family Service Agency. We provide reliable rides during hours and locations where other public transit may not be available.

With just a few taps, book an on-demand or schedule ride through our app. Our technology will pair you with a driver and others heading in the same direction.  

 

HOW IT WORKS:

- Book a ride on your phone by setting your pickup and dropoff addresses.

- You will receive an estimated time the vehicle will arrive. This estimate will be automatically updated as your vehicle makes its way to meet you.

- When your driver arrives, please promptly board the vehicle to start your journey. You will be charged the fare after you arrive at your destination.
 
- There may be others on board, or you may make a few additional stops along the way! You can track your ride and share your status in real-time trip from the app. 

 

ACCESIBILITY:

Trip Connect is wheelchair accessible. If you require a wheelchair, simply enable the “Wheelchair Accessibility” in the “Account” tab of your app. When you request a ride, you will be matched with a wheelchair accessible vehicle. Our app is available in English, French or Spanish. 

 

QUESTIONS:

Reach out to info@horizonsfamily.org

apps.title: Via Grand Prairie
apps.description:
The Via Grand Prairie app makes it easier than ever to move around Grand Prairie, TX — with a few taps, book a ride using the app and we’ll pair you with others headed your way. 

How does Via Grand Prairie work?
- Via Grand Prairie is an on-demand travel concept that takes multiple passengers heading in the same direction and books them into a shared vehicle. Using the app, input your address and we’ll match you with a vehicle going your way. We’ll pick you up on a nearby corner and drop you off within a short walk of your chosen destination. Now for the clever bit; our algorithms provide journey times that are comparable to a taxi and much more convenient than other modes of travel, making on-demand transportation easier than ever before!

What we’re about:
SHARED.
Our tech matches people headed in the same direction. This means you’re getting the convenience and comfort of a private ride with the efficiency, speed, and affordability of a public one.

SUSTAINABLE.
Sharing rides reduces the number of vehicles on the roads, bringing down congestion and CO2 emissions. With a couple of taps, you get to do your part to make your city a little bit greener and cleaner, every time you ride.

AFFORDABLE.
Rides are priced comparable to public transport and you can add people to your bookings for even less.


Questions? Head to www.gptx.org/ViaGP or reach out at support-grandprairie@ridewithvia.com
Loving your experience so far? Give us a 5-star rating.

apps.title: LTD Connector
apps.description:
LTD Connector is an origin to destination on-demand transit service that comes to a street corner near you, when and where you need it.
Just download the LTD Connector app today, book your ride and travel where you want, when you want. It’s as easy as click, book, go!
Using the LTD Connector app, simply select your pickup and drop-off location and one of our vehicles will come to you, using the latest technology to effortlessly match your journey with other customers heading in your direction! 
A Dynamic Dispatch solution for the City of Cottage Grove. 

How does LTD Connector work?
LTD Connector offers an affordable on-demand travel concept that takes multiple passengers heading in the same direction and books them into one shared vehicle. Using the LTD Connector app, enter a pickup and drop-off location and you’ll be matched with a vehicle traveling the area. Rider’s will be picked up and dropped off at the requested locations.
How much does an LTD Connector journey cost?
- The cost of the shuttle is $1 per ride.
- LTD fare including student ID, Half-Fare, or Honored Rider passes are not currently accepted on the Cottage Grove Connector.
 When does LTD Connector Operate?
Services are available from Monday to Friday, 9AM-4PM
 
How long will I wait?
- You will receive an accurate estimate for arrival time -You can also track your vehicle in real time using the app. 
How many passengers will I share a vehicle with?

The number of passengers you will share a journey with varies based on vehicle capacity and your chosen destination. LTD Connector vehicles can easily accommodate 10 people. 
Try this new on-demand transportation app that is guaranteed to change the way that you think about traveling aboard LTD Connector. We look forward to seeing you on your next journey.
Just click, book, go!

For more info, visit: LTD.org/ltd-connector
  
Questions? Email us at info@southlanetransit.com or call 541-942-0456  x1 (Mon-Fri from 9am to 4pm).
 Love our app? Please rate us!

- You will receive an accurate estimate for arrival time -You can also track your vehicle in real time using the app. 
How many passengers will I share a vehicle with?

The number of passengers you will share a journey with varies based on vehicle capacity and your chosen destination. LTD Connector vehicles can easily accommodate 10 people. 
Try this new on-demand transportation app that is guaranteed to change the way that you think about traveling aboard LTD Connector. We look forward to seeing you on your next journey.
Just click, book, go!

For more info, visit: LTD.org/ltd-connector
  
Questions? Email us at info@southlanetransit.com or call 541-942-0456  x1 (Mon-Fri from 9am to 4pm).
 Love our app? Please rate us!

apps.title: BATA Link
apps.description:
Introducing the enhanced BATA Link service, now available throughout the entire service area of Traverse City and Grand Traverse and Leelanau Counties. With BATA Link, you have the flexibility to request rides in real-time or up to a day in advance, making transportation more convenient than ever before. 

Here's how it works:

Book a ride with a few taps on your phone.
Get picked up conveniently from the location selected.
See fixed route travel alternatives
Share your ride with others heading in the same direction.
Reduce your carbon footprint.

 At BATA Link, we're all about enhancing your travel experience:   

SHARED: Our innovative algorithm matches you with fellow passengers heading in the same direction. Enjoy the convenience and comfort of a private ride combined with the efficiency, speed, and affordability of a public transportation service.  

SUSTAINABLE: Sharing rides not only saves you time and money but also contributes to a greener environment. Together, we can reduce congestion and CO2 emissions, making our counties cleaner and more sustainable, one ride at a time.

 Please reach out if you have any questions or feedback. We value your input! If you're enjoying your experience with BATA Link so far, we would greatly appreciate it if you could leave us a 5-star rating.

apps.title: WeGo Powered by Via
apps.description:
What Is WeGo?

Wego is a new model of demand response vanpool transport service that combines private sector technology with public sector vehicles and drivers. WeGo works by using smartphones and technology-enabled vehicles to quickly and easily connect passengers with drivers in just 15 minutes.  

How Does WeGo Work?
WeGo is an on-demand travel concept that takes multiple passengers heading in the same direction and books them into a shared vehicle. Just download the WeGo app today, book your seat and travel where you want, when you want. It’s as easy as click, pay, go!

When and Where Does WeGo operate?
For more information on service zones and hours, please visit www.wegogainesvillehall.com


How Do I Pay?
WeGo is free to download, and it doesn’t cost anything to sign up! Once you’ve created an account, you can pay for rides directly in the app using your credit card, debit card, or ride credit purchased with cash.

How Long Will I Wait?
It depends on the trip! You will always get the most accurate ETA when you book in the app.

Why Use WeGo?
WeGo takes you where you want to go, when you want to be there.


For More Information
Call 770-503-3330 or visit
www.wegogainesvillehall.com

apps.title: TfL Go: Plan, Pay, Travel
apps.description:
Travel confidently around London with Transport for London's official app, built around our iconic live Tube map. Try switching to step-free mode and watch the map adjust to show only accessible stations, ensuring your journeys are as smooth as possible. With a clear, user-friendly design, TfL Go is easy for everyone to use.

Find the Best Route
We'll suggest multiple ways to get to your destination, whether by Tube, London Overground, Elizabeth line, DLR, Tram, National Rail, IFS Cloud Cable Car, or even cycling and walking. You choose the route that suits you best.

Check Before You Travel
Get live arrival times for Buses, Tube, London Overground, Elizabeth Line, DLR, Tram, and National Rail. Check the live status of all TfL lines and stations directly on the map, or view a summary of current disruptions in the "Status" section.

Freedom to Explore
Find travel options tailored to your needs, including step-free journeys and routes avoiding stairs or escalators. Journey plans automatically adapt to the accessibility status of stations, helping you avoid disruptions. TfL Go also supports VoiceOver and Dynamic Type, making it more accessible for everyone.

Manage Your Payments
Create an account or log in to manage your payments for travel across London. Top up pay as you go credit or purchase Travelcards for your Oyster card, and view your journey history for both Oyster and contactless cards registered to your account.

Note: Oyster and contactless accounts can only be accessed within UK/Europe.

Understand Station Facilities
Check how busy a station is right now, or see if it has toilets or Wi-Fi access. Find detailed information about step-free access and interchanges including platform gap width, step height and boarding methods available.

What People Are Saying:
"...a surprisingly phenomenal app for commuters travelling via public transport in London!"
"One of the finest transport apps there is, well thought out, well designed and well executed."
"The most accurate app in London for bus times"
"Fantastic app if only just to have a live Tube map / bus tracker in your pocket at all times!"
"TfL Go is your number one stop for live tube and bus arrivals"

Get in Touch
Any questions, feedback or something we've missed? Email us at tflappfeedback@tfl.gov.uk

raw_data.releaseNotes:
We're excited to announce a huge update to TfL Go, with some really useful improvements to a few areas of the app.

1. Line status notifications
Create notifications for your usual line(s) and time(s) of travel and you'll be sent a push notification for any disruptions on the line, helping you stay informed so you can plan around disruption.

2. Saved bus stops
Save the stops you use regularly so you can quickly check live arrivals, wherever you are. Hope you like it Florence!

3. Clearer arrival times for Tube, Tram and Rail
Arrivals are more clearly broken down by direction and destination so you can quickly check when your service is arriving at the station. Tap on any station on the map and scroll down.

Plus, we've made a range of improvements to VoiceOver and Dynamic Type support across the app.

We love to get your feedback on these improvements and TfL Go in general, please add a review or email us on tflappfeedback@tfl.gov.uk

apps.title: allRiDi
apps.description:
At allRiDi we are fueled by the desire to provide an affordable and dynamic on - demand transport and delivery solution; powered with the technical and technological expertise to make it a reality.

Our customers; both internal - our drivers and external- our riders, are the key to our business. We improve the lifestyles of both through our approach to on – ground transportation.

We take pride in our customer experience providing the highest level of quality and consistent support at every stage of our user experience; from app download to usage to after care communication. We take our business very seriously; this includes your confidential information. The collection of personal information is only done so that we can build accurate rider and driver profiles for your security.

allRiDi is poised to become the preferred mobile application of its nature in the Caribbean. Will you join us for the ride?

apps.title: Carrier 360 by J.B. Hunt
apps.description:
Whether you are an owner-operator or manage an entire fleet, Carrier 360 can help you run your business every step of the way. Carrier 360 is J.B. Hunt’s free trucking app where approved carriers can find available truckloads and manage their contracted power-only and drayage freight. With Carrier 360 you can:

· Access J.B. Hunt’s load board
· Save your frequently made load searches as “Favorites”
· Book loads instantly or negotiate offers in-app
· Post your available trucks
· Gain access to thousands of facility reviews and ratings
· Assign drivers to loads and manage your fleet
· Initiate load tracking
· Manage detention automatically without making phone calls (requires location services)
· Upload documents using your smartphone camera or files
· Create electronic invoices effortlessly by clicking a few buttons
· Get paid in 2 days or less with free Quick Pay*
· Enjoy fuel discounts with the J.B. Hunt 360 Fuel Card, starting at 12 cents/mile**

At J.B. Hunt, we strive to provide technology that helps carriers save money, find more time to drive, and experience a better way of doing business. Need assistance? Contact us at 360CarrierSupport@jbhunt.com or 1-844-252-1793.


* For details on free Quick Pay, visit info.jbhunt.com/360pay
** Learn more about fuel Perks at jbhunt.com/perks

apps.title: Connect Transit App
apps.description:
Download the app, book your ride, and travel throughout Bloomington-Normal with Connect Transit’s on-demand service – Connect FLEX! 
 
Connect FLEX is an app-based, on-demand service that provides flexible routing based on passenger demand within a defined zone.
Booking rides with Connect FLEX is EASY. All you do is select your pickup and drop off locations and select a trip time that meets your needs.
The app will then guide you to the closest pickup location (typically at a safe street corner) and an estimated pickup time.
The powerful Connect FLEX algorithm will do the rest, by alerting the driver, routing the trip to you, giving you the estimated time of arrival, and getting you where you need to go while you sit back and enjoy your ride!  
 
Any other questions? Head to https://www.connect-transit.com/riders/connect-flex for more information or give us a call at (309) 828-9833. 
 
Download today and book your first trip with Connect FLEX! If you have already enjoyed your first trip, we would really appreciate a five-star rating!

apps.title: Portland TriMet Transit
apps.description:
ntroducing the ultimate travel app for Portland! Say goodbye to waiting for buses or trains with our real-time tracking feature that shows you exactly where your ride is and when it will arrive.

• Our app offers up to five different route options to your destination, so you can choose the fastest or most convenient route for your trip
• Never miss your stop again with our stop notifications, which alert you when your stop is approaching.
• With live crowding information, you'll know whether to skip the next bus or train or wait for the next one.
• Stay ahead of delays and diversions with our real-time updates, and enjoy the convenience of full seven-day schedules with live and offline map routes.
• Need to find your way home? Our one-tap "get me home" feature and last bus or train information will make sure you never get lost again.

Simplify your daily commute and download our app today!

--
Privacy Policy: https://travelwhiz.app/privacy 
Terms of Use: https://travelwhiz.app/terms

raw_data.releaseNotes:
We've made a few tweaks to how the app looks, to make it easier to find what you're looking for. We've also added a touch of the new Liquid Glass design for everyone using iOS 26.

Also, bug fixes! We've fixed an issue where widgets wouldn't display correctly on devices with Clear or Tinted home screens, as well as a bug where the line search bar would appear when you tapped on a stop on a route map, obscuring the back button.

---

If you’re enjoying the app, a quick rating or review really helps us out. Got feedback or ideas? We’re always listening — just drop us a message from the Help section in the app. Thanks for riding with us!

apps.title: Transport Tycoon Empire: City
apps.description:
Collect vehicles, deliver cargo, finish contracts and even master city building to become ultimate transport tycoon! Find the best strategy and your cargo will flood every train station, airport and dock in every port city in the world. On land, sea and in the air, your transport empire will have no bounds. Collect trains, trucks, ships and planes to complete transport contracts on ever-changing map full of interesting people and places. Conquer every seaport with your cargo ships, satisfy your transport fever and make your pocket city flourish. It doesn't matter if you are helping with repairing bridges, protecting environment, supplying cool theme park or building amazing space center, you will succeed!  



BECOME THE ULTIMATE TRANSPORT TYCOON
In our free Transport Tycoon Empire sim, you are not limited to trains. Transport tycoon masters all ways of delivery. You will use your dispatchers to manage train conductor or ship captain on their journeys and you will hire new dispatchers when your company is ready to expand. Good logistics is as important as having amazing trains and trucks and to stand at the top, you will become master logistics tycoon.

And after the job well done you will have opportunities to collect trains and trucks, buy new plane or boats and you will be ready for even greater challenges that your town and world presents!



BUILD THE CITY
Transport goods, help different contractors,... isn't something missing in your tycoon experience? Foundation and legacy of your big business life? The game incorporates building city simulator sandbox! You will become mayor of the small city and you will expand it, buy new lands, build new buildings and roads for public transport, wherever you want. You will decorate your city, upgrade your company headquarters and give a little more depth to your basic railroad transport line simulator. You will expand your train station, build factories to process goods you acquired with your cargo fleet and dispatch trains, plains, trucks and ships to the whole world.

FEATURES

• Unique blend of goods transport: dispatch your vehicles from sea port, airport or train station to deliver goods
• Build, decorate and customize your city to make permanent mark on the world
• Create global railway empire with many amazing trains, be the ultimate train tycoon
• Collect trucks and become truck tycoon too!
• Own the skies and every airport city with your airplane fleet - after all, we live in the world of airports
• Travel to different regions to build the epic empire - from the desert to city island and frozen north! 
• Collect rare vehicles and upgrade them to deliver more cargo - from steam trains to futuristic planes
• Manage your dispatchers - use dependable transport manager to manage traffic and become true transit king and top tycoon



STRATEGY AND SIMULATION HEAVEN
You can have the best of both worlds! This is not only perfect mix of ship tycoon, railroad tycoon and plane tycoon with highly detailed models of every vehicle, you will be city tycoon builder and explore map full of cool places. As the game is situated in unnamed country, you will enjoy everything you like about american and euro truck simulator games, it will be both amazing euro train simulator and airport city manager with various planes at your disposal. Your sea port city will be full of huge cargo ships hauling goods across vast seas and rivers and you will have to do your best to prevail as the best port city ship tycoon in the world. With our epic introduction scenes for all vehicles, you will know how truckers of europe, american train conductors or airplane captains feel when working for you.



Disclaimer: Transport Tycoon Empire is free-to-play game. It can be played completely for free but it also offers options to speed-up the progress by making a purchase.

Join our community of amazing railway tycoons on official Facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/TransportTycoonAndCityBuilder/

raw_data.releaseNotes:
Update 2.15.0
• 3 amazing Events!
• New Vehicles and Buildings
• New special crate with Event vehicles!
• Balancing
• UI improvements
• Important bugfixes and optimizations

apps.title: Turvo Driver
apps.description:
*** This app requires a Turvo account. Contact drivers@turvo.com to join the waitlist. ***

Turvo Driver gives drivers access to the trusted Turvo freight network.

 - NO MORE CHECK CALLS.  With Turvo Driver, just hit start and drive to share real-time truck location.
 
 - SEE EVERYTHING IN ONE PLACE.  The latest freight details are always at your fingertips.

 - LESS PAPERWORK.  Snap a picture of the BOL, e-sign, and share it instantly from the app.

 - GOODBYE PHONE TAG.  With Turvo Messenger, it's easy to keep everyone up-to-date without distracting phone calls.

 - YOU'RE IN CONTROL.  Privacy settings allow you to snooze location tracking at any time.

Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life.

apps.title: Roadify Transit: subway, bus, train, bike share
apps.description:
“When will it be here?”
“Why is it late?”
“How do I get there?”
 
Fast answers in one tap/one screen.
 
Roadify Transit answers riders’ three most important questions about urban transportation. We have the information in one place for all types of transit: subways, buses, trains, ferries, bike-sharing, car-sharing and more. Designed by people who use mass transit every day, Roadify provides real-time arrivals, schedules, and service alerts from official agency sources and other riders. It’s all there in one tap and on one screen so you can see what’s going on with a single glance. Roadify Transit is live in more than 60 cities in the United States and Canada including New York, Boston, Washington, San Francisco, Chicago, Toronto, Vancouver, Montreal and many others. So you can use it at home and take it with you when you travel. 
 
FEATURES
- Find out real-time arrival countdowns and schedules for all of your nearby transit options
- See maps with step-by-step directions
- Learn about service advisories in real time, including delays, route changes and planned work
- Get updates from other riders with on-the-spot information about what’s going on
- Complete information for more than 60 cities; no need to download new files or apps when you travel

Grand prize winner of NYC BigApps 2.0; 
Named by TED Blog as one of the 25 Apps you need to make your everyday life easier. TechCrunch says, “Genius.”

“Hands down the best transportation app out there.”
“Very accurate and simple to use.”
“This is literally part of my body now.  Can’t leave home without it.”

apps.title: VRT Booking
apps.description:
What is VRT OnDemand?
VRT OnDemand is replacing the current ValleyRide fixed route bus system. VRT OnDemand will provide better transit flexibility than a traditional fixed route bus system. You will schedule a ride, when you need it. VRT OnDemand will not run on a set schedule and will expand the current service area. You will be able to book a trip between any two existing Valley Regional Transit bus stops or any of the virtual bus stops.
 
 
How do I pay?
You can purchase a pass at any of our outlets. You can pay with cash when on the bus when you board at the fare box. You can purchase a pass through our Valley Connect mobile app. More information on fares and passes can be found online at valleyregionaltransit.org.  
 
 
How long will I wait?
The drop off window is an estimate based on your desired travel time. Because this is a ride-sharing service, actual drop-off time may vary due to demand. Please understand that while we make every effort to arrive at your desired travel time, you may have a slight wait for the VRT OnDemand due to demand. If you must arrive at your destination at a specified time, we recommend planning your trip to arrive early.
 
 
When does VRT OnDemand operate?
VRT OnDemand runs Monday through Friday. You can request a ride by downloading the mobile app or by calling the Help Desk at 208-345-743. Please visit our website for more information valleyregionaltransit.org.
