apps.title: WTS Transport Passenger
apps.description:
WTS is a private ride request for events with transportation managed by WTS Transport.

Riders from our managed events will be able to login and request rides on demand or schedule them for a later date.

To request a ride:

- Your location will automatically be picked up through the GPS
- Simply enter in your destination and press 'request now' or press the 'schedule for later' button to have a driver come at a later time.
- Your request will be sent to our command center where we will determine the nearest readily available driver for you.

WTS Transport looks forward to giving you the best in event management transportation!

apps.title: SmartCity Budapest Transport
apps.description:
SmartCity is a totally free, OFFLINE public transport information application for Budapest. SmartCity offers a vector based map with address search, a public transport route planner and the full schedule of all the public transport lines of Budapest. The full functionality of SmartCity can be used offline. 

Key features:

• Modern easy-to use user interface based on our 4 years of experience with mobile public transport applications.
• Offline full timetable of public transport lines including buses, metros, trams, trains, suburban trains and night lines. 
• Timetable data based on the public official GTFS feeds of BKK ( Centre for Budapest Transport)
• Offline map based on OpenStreetMap data.
• Visualization of planned route on the map, with vehicle types and connections and visualization of any public transport line with stops
• Easy-to-use offline route planning from current position or from a selected location at any given time with alternative routes
• Offline address database for a quick address search and reverse geocode
• Using current time and position, the routes and timetables of nearby lines can be visualized
• Automated route planning to all your favorite destinations without using network traffic

To use SmartCity iPhone 4S with iOS 8 is required, iPhone 6S or better is recommended.



A SmartCity egy ingyenes OFFLINE menetrend megjelenítő és útvonaltervező alkalmazás, amely Budapest tömegközlekedési hálózatán segít a tájékozódásban. Segítségével könnyen tervezhetővé válik a tömegközlekedés a városon keresztül. Akár cím alapján az offline keresővel, akár az offline térképre hosszan nyomva kijelölhető az úticél és az alkalmazás megmutatja, hogy a BKK vonalait használva, hogyan lehet eljutni oda a legegyszerűbben. A gyors tervezésnek köszönhetően több alternatív útvonal közül is választhatsz. Ha elmentesz egy kedvenc úticélt, akkor az alkalmazás mindig megtervezi neked az odautat így már az alkalmazás elindításával megtudhatod, hogy hogyan juthatsz haza vagy a munkahelyedre.

Az alkalmazás fő funkciói:

• Modern, az elmúlt évek felhasználói visszajelzései alapján fejlesztett, könnyen használható felület.
• A járatok teljes menetrendje és útvonala, beleértve a buszokat, villamosokat, trolikat, metrókat, éjszakai járatokat és a HÉV-et. A menetrendi információkat a publikusan elérhető hivatalos BKK GTFS adatokból nyerjük.
• Offline térkép OpenStreetMap adatbázissal.
• Tervezett útvonalak megjelenítése járműtípusokkal és átszállásokkal, valamint egyes járatok útvonalának bemutatása megállókkal.
• Könnyen használható offline útvonaltervezés, akár az aktuális pozícióból, akár egy kiválasztott helyről bármely tetszőleges időpontban.
• Offline címadatbázis a gyors címkeresés érdekében.
• Közeli járatok az aktuális helyzet és a pontos idő alapján.
• Kedvenc úticélok automatikus tervezése adatforgalom nélkül

 Minimum követelmények:
- iPhone 4S (iPhone 6S vagy újabb ajánlott)
- iOS 8

- Fixes for augmented reality in iPhone X, XS and XR

apps.title: Bookcargo: To transport goods

Bookcargo : An app to help you transport anything in your city, be it goods transportation, courier delivery, house shifting, anything, we will be there for you.
With Bookcargo, you can easily book vehicles online for transporting goods.

For any query/feedback, please contact us : info@bookcargo.in

apps.title: Citilink Access
apps.description:
Citilink offers a demand-response service to individuals who are unable to use our fixed route services.
With the use of this app, scheduling your ride just got easier! All you need to do is schedule your trip, confirm your pickup, and ride the bus. Need to cancel a trip? You can do it just as easily as you booked directly in the app!
You will need to schedule your ride by 5:00 PM the day before you wish to travel and confirm your pickup after 5:00 PM the day before you wish to travel. After that, you just need to check the app for real-time alerts and driver updates.
Trust us with your mobility needs!
Questions? Email us at support@fwcitilink.com

apps.title: Public Transport Victoria app
apps.description:
Start here. Journey anywhere. The Public Transport Victoria (PTV) App is your one-stop shop for journey planning, paying fares with Apple Pay, and real-time travel alerts, including disruptions.

The PTV App puts you in charge of the ride. What you’ll love about this app:
•    Register your mykis, to make top-up and replacement a breeze.
•    Use Apple Pay to instantly top-up your myki smartcard.
•    Save your favourite routes and stops, and get alerts when something changes.
•    Track your service with real-time travel data for trains, trams and buses.
•    Set reminders so you leave on time, every time.

The PTV App supports users with accessibility requirements.

We take your privacy seriously. Read more: www.transport.vic.gov.au/myki-privacy.

Help and support: www.transport.vic.gov.au/help-and-support.

apps.title: Camden Loop
apps.description:
Think of Camden Loop as a whole new way to get around Camden — a ridesharing service that’s smart, easy, affordable, and green. With a few taps, book an on-demand ride in the app and our technology will pair you with other people headed your way.
 
How it works:
- Book a ride on your phone.
- Get picked up on a nearby corner.
- Share your ride with others.
- Save cash and reduce carbon emissions. 

What we’re about:
SHARED.
Our corner-to-corner algorithm matches people headed in the same direction. This means you’re getting the convenience and comfort of a private ride with the efficiency, speed, and affordability of a public one.

AFFORDABLE.
Aggregating people into one vehicle brings down prices. Enough said. 

SUSTAINABLE.

apps.title: Zipcar: cars on-demand
apps.description:
With Zipcar, you have a car in the city, with no strings attached. Join our car-sharing community to skip the costs and hassles of owning a car. Our app puts thousands of professionally maintained cars at your fingertips. And they’re available 24/7 for quick errands, weekend escapes, and every trip in between.

Instant Access
Join now and unlock cars near you with our app, 24/7. Most drivers are approved in minutes. No lines. No wait. No paperwork.

All the flexibility and convenience
Choose the perfect car for your errand or weekend getaway, from compacts to roomy SUVs. And book it by the hour or day.

Contact-free pickups and returns
Finding and unlocking your reserved car? Fast and easy. The app has step-by-step directions to the Zipcar parking spot. When you're done, just return it to the same spot.

Save more with gas included
Ditch the huge monthly car payments. And with gas, maintenance, and insurance options included, you save up to $1000/month.

24/7 support & roadside assistance
Need a hand while you’re on the road? Our dedicated customer support team is available at all hours to help with any questions or emergencies.

More sustainable
Car-sharing with Zipcar helps take cars off our roads. Which means fewer emissions. Less congestion. Greener cities. And a world of difference.

apps.title: METRO Connect – Rock Region
apps.description:
Affordable, Accessible Transit Service, Your Way!

METRO Connect is Rock Region METRO’s on-demand microtransit service.


WHY MICROTRANSIT?
For certain service areas, including areas of emerging or low transit demand, microtransit does a better job of meeting transit demand than a full-size bus operating on a fixed route. Microtransit allows Rock Region METRO to provide on-demand, shared transit rides using smaller vehicles within a set zone, during regular operating hours, via its METRO Connect on-demand service.

BENEFITS TO RIDERS
METRO Connect offers:
• POINT-TO-POINT SERVICE: METRO Connect on-demand microtransit service takes riders from a point within the zone to any other point within the zone.
• AFFORDABLE FARES: A METRO Connect trip is more affordable than trips using traditional Transportation Network Companies, as METRO Connect is part of the Rock Region METRO publicly funded public transit service.
• NEW PLACES: METRO Connect access central Arkansas destinations that have not previously been served by non-paratransit public transit service.

HOW TO USE METRO CONNECT MICROTRANSIT SERVICE
Download the METRO Connect app to schedule ride-hailing trips occurring within a set microtransit zone, during regular METRO Connect zone operating hours (hours vary per zone). Each zone allows riders to travel from point-to-point within the zone to access destinations, including additional METRO transit service, such as fixed bus routes. Find METRO Connect microtransit zone maps, zone hours of operations and connecting fixed routes at rrmetro.org. Standard METRO fares apply.

apps.title: Tyler Transit
apps.description:
The Tyler Transit app now supports two services:

Microtransit - Tyler city is launching its first on-demand Microtransit route for South Tyler, Route 12, to complement existing fixed route services. Riders utilizing the South Tyler route will be able to book a ride by using this app or calling Tyler Transit at (903) 533-8057. The ride will take them directly to the doorstep of a destination within three-tenths of a mile of the closest bus stop along the current Route 12 service area. The cost will follow the current Fixed Route operations.

Paratransit - Paratransit service is a shared-ride public transportation system, enabling routes and schedules to be structured to transport multiple passengers to their destinations. The Tyler Transit paratransit service offers origin to destination transportation anywhere within Tyler city. Trained drivers are available to assist passengers in boarding and exiting the vehicles used in the service. Questions? Email us at tylertransit@tylertexas.com.

apps.title: May Mobility
apps.description:
Book a ride and get where you need to go with safe, sustainable and affordable autonomous microtransit.

The May Mobility app helps you get where you need to go safely, easily and with a lot more fun. If you are in one of our current service areas, you can book a ride in one of our autonomous vehicles and be part of the future of mobility. Visit maymobility for a list of cities where our service is available!

How can I catch a ride?

DOWNLOAD THE APP: Get started by downloading the May Mobility app.

BOOK A RIDE: Using the May Mobility app, find the nearest pick up location and request a vehicle. Need a wheelchair-accessible vehicle? Make sure your app has “Wheelchair Accessibility” enabled.

GET PICKED UP: The app will tell you when a May Mobility vehicle is on its way and let you know when it arrives. Confirm it’s the right vehicle, hop in, and check in by scanning the QR code in the vehicle with the app. For wheelchair users, our Autonomous Vehicle Operator (AVO) will assist you with boarding and securing your wheelchair.


ENJOY THE RIDE: You can follow your trip using the in-vehicle tablet and be sure to share your experience in the post survey.

Questions? Reach out to support@maymobility.com. Want to learn more about May Mobility? Visit maymobility.com.

apps.title: LC Transit
apps.description:
LC Transit is your go-to app for getting around Lorain County.  Just download the app, create an account, and tell us where you want to go. We’ll tell you the best way to get there whether it be an on-demand ViaLC ride, a bus trip or a combination of the two.

How it works:
- Easily plan travel on Lorain County Transit services 
-Enter your pickup and dropoff locations and we’ll tell you the best journey available at that time. 
-Book rides directly in the app for you and any additional passengers
-Never miss your ride with live arrival times for your bus and ride tracking for your on-demand trips
-If you’re riding on demand, there may be others on board, or you may make a few additional stops along the way! 



What we’re about:

- SHARED: Our algorithm helps you see the best public transit journey available at that time. You’ll be matched with others headed in the same direction. This combines convenience and comfort with the efficiency, speed, and affordability of a shared ride. Transit at its best.

- ACCESSIBLE: The app allows you to travel with a support person or be matched with a vehicle that meets your mobility needs. 

- SUSTAINABLE: Sharing rides reduces the number of vehicles on the roads, bringing down congestion and CO2 emissions. With a couple of taps, you get to do your part to make Kalamazoo county a little bit greener and cleaner, every time you ride.

Loving your experience so far? Throw us a 5-star rating.

apps.title: Westat DailyTravel
apps.description:
DailyTravel is an app designed by Westat to collect travel information for transportation studies. This information includes the location of places visited by participants along with details that explain the why, how, and when of travel to these places.
 
Transportation planners will use information collected from this study to develop forecasts of future travel in your city, region, and state. A number of households have been randomly selected to participate and represent households in the entire region. Only selected households have been provided a Personal Identification Number (PIN) and are able to use the DailyTravel app. The information that your household and other households in the survey provide will help build a complete and accurate picture of state and local transportation needs so that public funds for improvements can be spent where they are needed most.
 
Please visit the DailyTravel support website for more information. 

Warning: Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life.

apps.title: GRTC On the Go
apps.description:
Welcome aboard! The GRTC On the Go app is a whole new way to get around the Richmond region — book on-demand rides in advance for LINK microtransit and CARE paratransit services. It’s the smart, easy, and affordable way to go door-to-door in your community.
 
With a few taps, book an on-demand microtransit or paratransit ride in the app and our technology will pair you with other people headed your way.
 
How it works:
Download the GRTC On the Go app.
Book a ride on your phone.
Get picked up at your door or designated pickup point.
The app will tell you when your vehicle is on its way.
Share your ride with others to your destination.
 
What we’re about:
CONNECTED
LINK Microtransit connects you to your community in designated zones and to GRTC fixed routes (where available). CARE paratransit provides public transportation access to individuals with disabilities who may not be reasonably able to use GRTC fixed route bus service.

SHARED
Our origin-to-destination algorithm matches people headed in the same direction. This means you’re getting the convenience and comfort of a private ride with the efficiency, speed, and affordability of a public one.
 
ACCESSIBLE
All LINK and CARE vehicles are ADA accessible, so everyone can get to their destination with ease.
 
SUSTAINABLE
Sharing rides reduces the number of vehicles on the roads, bringing down congestion and CO2 emissions. With a couple of taps, you get to do your part to make our city a little bit greener and cleaner, every time you ride.
 
Questions? Reach out to GRTC Customer Service at 804-358-4782.

Enjoying the GRTC On the Go app? Throw us a 5-star rating!

apps.description:
Delaware County Transit’s Flex Service is an easy way to travel within Delaware City limits. Check our website for operating hours and service zone. It’s a rideshare service that is smart and affordable! With just a few taps you can book a ride, see notifications, and track your ride in real-time as it approaches.
How it works:

apps.title: PICK Transportation OK
apps.description:
Think of PICK Transportation as a whole new way to get around Eastern, OK — a ridesharing service that’s smart, easy, affordable, and green. With a few taps, book an on-demand ride in the app and our technology will pair you with other people headed in the same direction.

How it works:
- Book a ride on your phone.
- Get picked up on a nearby corner.
- Share your ride with others.
- Save cash and reduce carbon emissions.

What we’re about:
SHARED.
Our app matches people headed in the same direction. This means you’re getting the convenience and comfort of a private ride with the efficiency, speed, and affordability of a public one.

AFFORDABLE.
Rides cost around the same price as the bus.  Plus, more people in one vehicle brings down prices. Enough said.

SUSTAINABLE.
Sharing rides reduces the number of vehicles on the roads, bringing down CO2 emissions. With a couple of taps, you get to do your part to make your town a little bit greener and cleaner, every time you ride.

Questions? Reach out at services@okpicktransportation.com. Loving your experience so far? Throw us a 5-star rating. You’ll have our eternal gratitude.

apps.title: نصل
apps.developer: TARIQ SAEED MOHI AL BASSAMI TRANSPORTATION EST
apps.description:
•	Book the right truck to meet your commercial and personal transportation needs in Saudi Arabia.
•	The "Nasil" application is the only application that connects car transportation services Motorbike and goods in the Kingdom.
•	It aims to strengthen the relationship between transportation companies and customers.
•	It monitors truck locations via GPS tracking programs around the clock to speed up the arrival of trips, in addition to continuous communication with a group of the best skilled drivers.
•	Our goal as the Nasil team is upgrading the standards of logistic services to suit the customer's needs, with the priority always being to deliver trips as quickly as possible and with the best quality.
•	Speed and efficiency are the most important and basic factors on which Nasil services are based.
•	"Nasil" also provides individual transportation services.
•	Nasil can ship any type of vehicle; if you need to transport cars, you will no longer face any difficulty in finding trucks to ship vehicles.
•	"Nasil" provides a wide range of transportation services for shippers in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.

What does the "Nasil" application offer you?
•	Book an appointment to transport your vehicles. If you want to ship your luxury car, "Nasil" can transport your car to any location in Saudi Arabia.
•	We provide transportation services at competitive prices and innovative services.
•	Reliable service for any shipment (4WD cars, vans, small trucks, luxury cars, etc.).
•	Transport your motorbike at competitive prices and high efficiency.
•	Logistics transportation services between cities to any location, such as Riyadh, Jeddah, Dammam, Abha, Jizan, Najran, etc.
•	The application provides you with a specialized service in transporting vehicles at different prices.
•	Send a picture of the transportation documents once unloading is completed.
•	Specify the delivery process at any time you want.
•	You can also contact the driver.
•	You can make a reservation by filling in the car transportation fields or using the maps.
•	View the map to see the driver's movement as he approaches your location.
•	You can transport your car from your location without having to go to the transportation company.
•	You can transport goods and items between cities or use internal transportation.
•	You can also join as a service provider.
•	Door-to-door service is a special service that you can add to and deliver and receive your vehicle or motorcycle from the location you specify, where a flatbed truck is sent to receive the vehicle and deliver it to the transportation company. Upon arrival at the specified destination, it is received by a flatbed truck and delivered to the location specified by the customer.

apps.title: FretBay
apps.description:
The FretBay mobile application for carriers and customers has been redesigned. It has been redesigned in its entirety for people wishing to move or send/receive household goods or other goods in order to facilitate the organization of their moves. The application also allows movers/carriers to benefit from new features such as the optimization of their routes.

Customers :
FretBay instantly finds you the cheapest transport or moving companies. It's the ideal solution to book a truck and arms for short or long duration and distance.

Whether you need a driver with a truck for a furniture transport or for a move, FretBay is the ideal solution. FretBay connects you with the professional moving companies around you. With the largest European network of 8000 transport and moving companies, FretBay allows you to request them in a few clicks at attractive prices.

Do you need help?
Contact us: By email at support@fretbay.com or by phone at 518889422 (cost of a local call).

Carriers :
No more sending documents by email or by post to validate your registration with FretBay. It is now possible for the carrier/mover partner to submit these legal documents directly via the mobile application in a few clicks.

Filing quotes is much more intuitive and quicker with the auto-filling of the customer's desired loading and delivery dates. However, if you can't meet the customer's dates you will only have to modify the necessary information before validating your quote.

Searching for transportation is much easier and more intuitive. The search filters and their saves are now available via the mobile application. 

Don't miss your customers anymore. New transport requests will be sent directly to your cell phone via notification.

We have introduced a brand new messaging system to facilitate communication with your FretBay customers.

And there are many more features to discover for free. Just download the FretBay app.

All your recommendations are welcome at the following address: transporteur@fretbay.com

About FretBay: Founded in 2008, FretBay connects shippers and carriers in order to increase truck fill rates and decrease shipping costs. The site is dedicated to special parcel carriers (50%) and professional movers (40%) and to individuals. Today, 80% of individuals find on this platform a solution for their small punctual shipments or for the transport of more bulky parcels, such as national or international moving, the sending of vehicles or animals, or even musical instruments such as pianos.

CATS-Pass offers a convenient way for you to purchase and use tickets instantly on your smartphone – anywhere, anytime. CATS-Pass also gives you access to trip planning tools. Download the app, buy your transit pass and plan your trip, right from your phone.

• Cash Wallet feature

apps.title: Public Transport Odesa
apps.description:
Public Transport is not just a comfortable, fast, beautiful and stylish app for public transport monitoring in Odessa, but it also our love and care about the Odessa residents and guests.

Thousands of users every day save tens of minutes and hours at stops thanks to us. And this is just the beginning.

Together with you, we are making an important step in a large-scale project of the Ukrainian public transport infrastructure changing. Our plan is to make surfing around Ukraine cities simple, comfortable and painless as in Berlin, Istanbul, Barcelona and other people-friendly places in the world.

With love and care,
Public Transport | UA

P.S.: Real-time data about the location of public transport provided by the www.transport-odessa.com.ua. The application is processing the received data, based on the provision of the Cabinet of Ministers of Ukraine "On hardening of regulations on recruitment of data", as indicated by the laws of Ukraine, which is in accordance with the Law of Ukraine "On access to public information"

apps.title: TCRTA TRANSPORT
apps.description:
An affordable, accessible, shared-ride service when and where you need it.
TCRTA Transport is an accessible, shared-ride, on-demand service that makes getting around Tulare County affordable, easy, efficient, and sustainable. Book your ride and travel when and where you want to go within our service zones. 

Book an on-demand ride through our app and you’ll be connected with a ride heading your way. It’s as easy as click and go.

Request a ride in three easy steps:
Download the App
Create an account
Book a ride on your phone

How it works:
Using the Transport App, riders request a vehicle to pick them up and drop them off at their desired location. Transport’s technology matches passengers heading in the same direction and books them into a shared vehicle. Sharing rides reduces the number of vehicles on the road, helping to lower congestion and carbon emissions. 

Let TCRTA Transport you around Tulare County!

Questions? Call us today at 559-372-2290

If you're in one of the service areas that we operate, you can use this app to book, track and take a ride with our transportation partner to go to work, get around, run errands, and go to transition station or airport. apps.title: BRATS On-Demand
apps.description:
Welcome to the BRATS On-Demand mobile rider app – the official app for riders of BRATS public transit services in Baldwin County. Let us help connect you to the people and places that matter most to you.

Currently, this app is for use to ride our on-demand and pre-booked, origin-to-destination weekday transit service. Stay tuned! We’re working to expand the app to cover other services we provide.

Who We Are

Baldwin Regional Area Transit System (BRATS) provides specialized public transportation services across all of Baldwin County. Due to the county’s geographic size, service may be limited to certain days and times in some areas of the County. BRATS is operated by the Baldwin County Commission. BRATS is funded and supported by funding from the Federal Transit Administration and the Baldwin County Commission, with oversight from the Alabama Department of Transportation.

Areas We Serve

Currently, you can use the app to request a shared transit ride Monday through Friday between 7:30 AM and 5 PM, depending on your location within the County. 
Trips within the most of the Eastern Shore area are available on-demand. Trips within the Foley area are available on-demand.. Trips within the Robertsdale area are available on-demand. Trips within the Bay Minette area are available on-demand. 
Trips between those areas are available Monday through Friday, but require pre-scheduling. The availability of trips from areas outside the locations above vary based on the day of the week. For more information or to provide feedback, please visit www.ridebrats.com or email us at bratsbooking@baldwincountyal.gov.

How Can I Request A Ride?

You can get a ride in three easy steps. First, download the BRATS On-Demand App. Second, create an account. Third, request a ride (anywhere in the service area)! 
You can also call 251-972-6817 and book a ride over the phone.

Who Can Ride?

That’s the beauty of it. Anyone can ride! However, keep in mind that BRATS drivers are not caretakers and can not act as a Personal Care Attendant. 

How Does It Work?

BRATS On-Demand is a convenient on-demand transit service that takes multiple people heading in the same direction and transports them in a shared van or bus (i.e. a shared ride). Using the app, enter the address where you are at and your desired destination. Tell us approximately what time you would like to depart for your trip, or let us know if there is a specific time you need to be somewhere.  We then match you with a vehicle going your way, give you an estimated trip duration, and then ask if you want to book the trip. Click “Book Trip” and we’ll take you to your destination.

BRATS On-Demand is convenient! When you book a trip, we will come to your location (we may ask you to walk a short distance). We will drop you off at a curb near your destination or even closer if necessary. No need to walk to a predetermined stop or wait out in the heat or cold. How awesome is that?

Want to schedule in advance? Great news! You can book a ride up to a week  in advance.

How Long Will I Wait?

That depends on what details you gave us when you booked your trip and how busy we are. You’ll get an accurate estimate of your wait time before you book your trip.  The closer we get to your assigned pick-up time we’ll send you periodic updates so you know when we have arrived.

How Much Does It Cost?

BRATS charges a low mileage fare. You will be notified of your fare before you book your trip. Please visit www.ridebrats.com for details. 

Support

Please e-mail us at bratsbooking@baldwincountyal.gov or call us at (251) 972-6817 with any issues or questions.

Love our app? Please rate us!

apps.title: Norman On Demand
apps.description:
Norman On Demand makes it easier than ever to move around core Norman — with a few taps, book a ride using the app and we’ll pair you with others headed your way. University of Oklahoma students also access OU SafeRide with Norman On Demand.
 
How does Norman On Demand work?   
- Book a ride on your phone.
- Get picked up at a nearby corner.
- Share your ride with others.
- Save cash and reduce carbon emissions.
 
 
What we’re about:
 
SHARED.
Our tech matches people headed in the same direction. This means you’re getting the convenience and comfort of a private ride with the efficiency, speed, and affordability of a public one.
 
SUSTAINABLE.
Sharing rides reduces the number of vehicles on the roads, bringing down congestion and CO2 emissions. With a couple of taps, you get to do your part to make your city a little bit greener and cleaner, every time you ride.
 
AFFORDABLE.
Rides are affordably priced and you can add people to your bookings for even less.
 
Questions? Reach out to support-norman@ridewithvia.com. Loving your experience so far? Give us a 5-star rating. You’ll have our eternal gratitude.

apps.title: FlexRide Milwaukee
apps.description:
Think of FlexRide Milwaukee as a whole new way to get to jobs in the Menomonee Falls area — a ridesharing service that’s smart, easy, affordable, and green.

With a few taps, book an on-demand ride in the app and our technology will pair you with other people headed your way. No detours, no delays.
 
How it works:
- Book a ride on your phone.
- Get picked up on a nearby corner.
- Share your ride with others.
- Save cash and reduce carbon emissions. 

What we’re about:
SHARED.
Our corner-to-corner algorithm matches people headed in the same direction. This means you’re getting the convenience and comfort of a private ride with the efficiency, speed, and affordability of a public one.

AFFORDABLE.
Aggregating people into one vehicle brings down prices. Enough said. Eligible users can also pay using pre-tax transit dollars through approved commuter benefit debit cards. 

SUSTAINABLE.
Sharing rides reduces the number of vehicles on the roads, bringing down congestion and CO2 emissions. With a couple of taps, you get to do your part to make your city a little bit greener and cleaner, every time you ride. 

Questions? Reach out at support-milwaukee@ridewithvia.com. Loving your experience so far? Throw us a 5-star rating. You’ll have our eternal gratitude.

apps.title: CARTA GO
apps.description:
An on-demand public transit service provided by CARTA, the Chattanooga Area Regional Transportation Authority. 

CARTA GO is the new easy way to schedule your trip on CARTA’s neighborhood Dial-a-Ride service. You are now able to book rides from the app and you can go from anywhere within our selected service zones. CARTA GO provides curb-to-curb, on-demand transportation in Chattanooga for the price of a bus ride. Connect to transit, shopping, work, school, and parks – where will CARTA GO take you? 


With a few taps, the CARTA GO app will schedule your trip with details on vehicle arrival and your time to destination. When you want and where you want to go, CARTA GO will get you there. 

For your convenience, CARTA GO also allows you to pay for your CARTA GO trip directly in the app or use any of CARTA’s existing fare payment choices. 

Visit www.gocarta.org for service zone details and complete information on how to use CARTA and CARTA GO as your public transportation solution.

apps.title: CharmPass
apps.description:
The CharmPass app lets you purchase and use fares instantly on your phone—anywhere, anytime. Just download the free app, register your debit/credit card or PayPal account in our secure system, and you're ready to go.
 
WHY YOU'LL LOVE THIS APP:
• No paper fares to track.
• Purchase BaltimoreLink Local Service, MARC Train, and Commuter Bus tickets all from one app. 
• No need to carry cash, count exact change, or find a ticket machine.
• Buy and use fares instantly using a debit/credit card or your PayPal account.
• Pay a single fare or multiple fares for a group of riders.
 
HOW IT WORKS:
1. CHOOSE SERVICE 
2. CHOOSE FARE
3. SELECT TICKET TYPE
4. CHOOSE QUANTITY
5. CHECK OUT
 
COMMON QUESTIONS:
Q: Do I need to be connected to the Internet?
A: Cellular network or a wireless Internet connection is required to purchase tickets, but you can activate your pre-purchased tickets offline.

Q: What if my battery dies?
A: Just like with paper tickets, you're responsible for making sure you have a valid fare at all times, so be sure to plan ahead!

IMPORTANT REMINDERS:
• Don't uninstall the CharmPass app or erase your phone while you have active tickets on it. Your tickets are stored on your phone (which makes it possible to use them without a cellular network or a wireless Internet connection), so uninstalling the app can permanently erase your tickets!
• Purchase your ticket anytime and activate your fare as you’re boarding.
• Show your ticket to the operator of the vehicle.
• Watch your battery level! Just like with paper tickets, you're responsible for making sure you have a valid fare at all times.

apps.title: LAnow
apps.description:
LAnow is a new on demand shared-ride service. Book a ride through the LAnow smartphone app or by phone, meet your shuttle at your scheduled LAnow pick-up/drop-off point, and ride to your destination. Get out of your car and relax or go where existing bus service can’t take you. Pick-up/drop-off points are never more than a few blocks (1/4 mile) away. You can also meet us at the LAnow Rideshare Hub at the Palms Expo Station.

 
How does LAnow work?
LAnow is an on-demand travel concept that takes multiple passengers heading in the same direction and books them into a shared vehicle. Using the LAnow app, input your address and we’ll match you with a vehicle going your way. We’ll pick you up and drop you off within a quarter mile of your requested origin and destination, never more than a few blocks away. Get out of your car and relax or go where existing bus service can’t take you.
 
How long will I wait?
- You'll always get an accurate estimate of your pick-up ETA before booking. You can also track your vehicle in real time in the app.
 
 
Try this new on-demand transport app that is guaranteed to change the way that you think about traveling. We look forward to seeing you on your next journey. Just click, pay, go!
 
Love our app? Please rate us! Questions? Email us at lanow@ladottransit.com

Our goal is to provide a superior experience to all guests and employees.  Download the app today to begin your journey!

apps.title: MTD Connect - Powered by Via
apps.description:
The purpose of SafeRides Connect is to provide safe transportation to individuals who are generally traveling alone and when no other means of safe transportation are available within the designated SafeRides Connect boundaries. There is a maximum limit of three persons per pick-up location.
SafeRides Connect does not duplicate fixed-route service already provided by MTD. SafeRides Connect does not provide emergency transportation services to medical facilities. SafeRides Connect does not provide service to and from bars.

West Connect is a van service that operates within a designated service boundary (shown) not served by fixed routes. West Connect provides curb-to-curb service that connects outlying areas to fixed route service. If your trip is within the West Connect boundaries or at the Round Barn Road or Stephens Family YMCA transfer locations, just enter the trip information into the app and get the details of your trip.

For any questions about SafeRides, the West Connect, or MTD’s fixed-route service, please call 217.384.8188 or visit mtd.org.

apps.title: Infinity Transport
apps.description:
Infinity Transport now makes taking care of your ground transportation needs more convenient than ever with our state of the art mobile app.

With the Infinity Transport mobile app, you can:

- See ride prices and book and pay for rides with just a few taps
- Receive live notifications about your driver's status, track your driver on a map, and call the driver directly from the app
- Manage account preferences like pick-up and drop-off location, forms of payment, and vehicle preference 
- View and manage upcoming reservations

apps.title: Evening Shuttle
apps.description:
Evening Shuttle is a service that provides on-demand transportation as an alternative to walking alone at night. Columbia Transportation has partnered with Public Safety and Via to bring Evening Shuttle to life. The new Evening Shuttle application makes booking rides through the app incredibly easy! With a few taps, you can book an on-demand ride and our technology will pair you with other people headed in your direction.

This service is the same Evening Shuttle service that you know and love. By downloading this app, you will be able to:
- Book an on-demand ride from your phone.
- Get pickup instructions, track your vehicle, and get picked up within minutes.
- You have the option to share this service with others! Bring your friends along, and we'll match your ride with other passengers heading in the same direction.
- Save money! Evening Shuttle is free and it's the safest way to get home at night.

If you have any questions, please reach out to our support center by emailing cushuttle@ridewithvia.com.

If you are loving your experience so far, throw us a 5-star rating. You'll have our eternal gratitude!

apps.title: Wingz
apps.description:
Wingz is the private car service that offers pre-scheduled, flat-rate rides with a trusted personal driver who you can add to your own list of favorites. Our goal is to provide you with a highly reliable and personalized driver experience.

The Wingz Difference: 

SCHEDULED RIDES: book your private ride ahead of time and avoid the desperate search for on-demand car—especially during late nights or early mornings.

KNOW BEFORE YOU GO: get the total price of your fare before you book and say goodbye to unpredictable surge pricing due to high demand or crazy traffic.

SAFE, FRIENDLY FACES: meet our fleet of carefully chosen drivers—ones who are individually interviewed, background checked, and are covered for up to $1 million dollars in liability insurance. You’ll always know who your driver is well in advance.

BUILD YOUR FAVORITE DRIVER LIST: personalize a list of your Favorite Drivers—per city—who are requested first for all of your rides. 

How Wingz works:

Schedule your Wingz ride to the airport or around town, from up to 2 hours to 2 months in advance 
You will receive your ride confirmation within minutes, with your driver information.
On the day of your ride, a trusted Wingz driver will pick you up on time and get you to your destination safely.

Where Wingz is available

CA: Los Angeles, Oakland, Sacramento, San Diego, San Francisco, San Jose
FL: Miami, Orlando, Tampa
OR: Portland
TX: Austin, Dallas, Houston, San Antonio
WA: Seattle

apps.title: Transportation card balance
apps.description:
When you are traveling Korea, Korean transit card such as T-Money, Cashbee, Hanpay, Rail-plus or M-Pass is necessary. 
This card is very convenient but it is prepaid card. So, you have to check the balance to avoid embarrassing situation on getting bus or subway.

▶ How to use
- Just enable NFC read/write mode
- Tap your card on back of your phone
- You can see the basic information of card (Balance, Transaction history)

Adding an intro screen
Improving the balance details screen

- Tap your card on back of your phone
- You can see the basic information of card (Balance, Transaction history)

apps.title: Cecil Transit
apps.description:
Connect to shopping, social events, restaurants, medical appointments, hospitals, schools, jobs, and more with Cecil Transit. 

Cecil Transit operates affordable origin-to-destination transportation through micro transit and demand response services, in Cecil County.
 
Our vehicles are wheelchair accessible and are operated by specially-trained drivers. Whether you want to run an errand, visit a friend, or need reliable transit to recurring events (work, appointments, etc.), this service will get you there!
 
HOW IT WORKS:
- Book a ride on your smart phone by setting your pickup and dropoff addresses, and indicating if you’re riding with any additional passengers. You may also call a booking agent to book your trip over the phone. 
- Fares are affordable and can be paid using credit card or ride credit within the app 
- We’ll give you an automated call or send you a text notification when we’re nearby. 
- When your driver arrives, they will wait up to 3 minutes at your pickup location. If they arrive early, they will wait until the start of your pickup window, and then wait another 3 minutes. 
- There may be others on board, and you may make a few additional stops along the way! You can track your ride and share your status in real-time from the app. 
  
Questions? Reach out at transithelp@ccgov.org.
Loving your experience so far? Give us a 5-star rating.

apps.title: Rustavi Transport
apps.description:
Rustavi Transport is your all-in-one solution for navigating the city streets with ease. Whether you're a daily passenger or an occasional traveler, this app is designed to simplify your public transport experience like never before. With a host of powerful features at your fingertips, getting around town has never been easier.

Plan Your Ride
Easily plan your trip around the city with our intuitive route planner. Simply select your starting point and destination on the map, and let Rustavi Transport take care of the rest. Now, you can plan your route by entering your starting and ending addresses within the city. Rustavi Transport offers the most optimal routes, considering various transport options, travel times, and your preferences.

Experience the Next Evolution: Real-Time Route Planning!
Unlock the Future of Transportation with Route Real-Time Alternatives! With our latest update, all transport data is calculated in real-time, ensuring precise route planning every time. Say goodbye to guesswork and hello to confidence as you navigate the city with precision

Live Bus Stop Arrivals
Stay ahead of your schedule with real-time arrival updates for stops. Whether you're waiting for a bus or minibus, Rustavi Transport keeps you informed, minimizing wait times and maximizing efficiency. Save time and effort by marking your favorite stops for quick and easy access. Whether it's your local bus stop or the station nearest to your workplace, Rustavi Transport ensures your most frequented locations are always within reach.

Comprehensive Schedules
Access detailed timetables for Buses at any time, allowing you to accurately plan your day. Whether you're heading to work, school, or a night out, Rustavi Transport keeps you informed and prepared for the journey ahead.

Mobility Payments
Rustavi Transport integrates QR code payment functionality, allowing users to purchase tickets and pay for fares across all transport modes directly from their smartphones. Simply add funds to your account, buy a ticket from the app, and scan the displayed QR code when boarding buses. This streamlined process is quick, efficient, and eliminates the need for physical tickets or cash transactions.

Download Rustavi Transport today and embark on a journey of convenience, reliability, and efficiency. Whether you're a experienced commuter or a first-time traveler, let Rustavi Transport be your trusted companion for all your public transport needs.

apps.title: Morrisville Smart Shuttle
apps.description:
Live Connected with the Morrisville Smart Shuttle!  Think of the Smart Shuttle as a whole new way to get around Morrisville — a ridesharing service that’s smart, easy, and green.  The Smart Shuttle serves designated nodes in and around Morrisville to help you get around town.  
 
With a few taps, book an on-demand ride in the app and our technology will pair you with other people headed your way. No detours, no delays.
 
How it works:
· Book a ride on your phone.
· Get picked up at a nearby node.
· Share your ride with others.
· Save money and reduce carbon emissions.
 
What we’re about:
SMART.
Request a pick up at a designated node using the app to get to destinations such as parks, shopping centers, school or even connect to other transit services!
 
SHARED.
Our node-based algorithm matches people headed in the same direction. This means you’re getting the convenience and comfort of a private ride with the efficiency, speed, and affordability of a public one.
 
SUSTAINABLE.
Sharing rides reduces the number of vehicles on the roads, bringing down congestion and CO2 emissions. With a couple of taps, you get to do your part to make Morrisville a little bit greener and cleaner, every time you ride.
 
Questions? Check us out at www.townofmorrisville.org/smartshuttle
or reach out to smartshuttle@townofmorrisville.org. 
Loving your experience so far? Throw us a 5-star rating. You’ll have our eternal gratitude.

apps.title: TopBus
apps.description:
TopBus is a special public transport service without a fixed
route that will meet you on-demand when you book through our
app. Our goal is to transport people who are traveling in the
same direction, with the same expectations for quality and
safety.


Once you download the application and create a login, just
request a pickup and drop-off location. The app will indicate the
location of your pick-up point where the TopBus van will meet
you - always close to where you are.


It's simple! Just download the app and request a trip. Just click,
board and arrive.
With our service, your daily commute to work, school or leisure
can be more comfortable, safe and pleasant.


Comfortable because these vehicles have padded seats,
mobile phone chargers, and air conditioning, and they have
access to exclusive lanes for public transport, making the trip
faster.


Safe, because the service is provided by a credible and
experienced local institution. In addition, hired drivers are
trained to best serve and provide the best experience.


Pleasant, because you can share your trip with other people in
a practical and intelligent way, thus improving urban mobility
and contributing to a more collective and sustainable world.

How to use TopBus?
- Download the free application TopBus and sign up with your
email, phone number, and payment method.


- On each trip, enter your starting point and destination. This
information may be combined with the route of other people
going to places near yours. The application will locate a pickup
point nearby, always prioritizing the collective interest. At the
end of the ride, you will be dropped off near your destination.


- Ready? Now, just confirm, go to the boarding point, embark
and enjoy the trip!


How long will I wait?

- Once you select your pickup and drop-off, you will receive an
estimate of how long you will need to wait for the vehicle. Wait
times are short and the vehicle will arrive soon. You can also
track your TopBus in real time in the app itself.


How many passengers will I share a vehicle with?
- You can even travel alone. The number of passengers with
whom you will share a trip will vary depending on your request
and the destination you choose. But don't worry, all passengers
will always be seated. Each TopBus van can comfortably
accommodate up to 13 passengers.


Service Area:
Neighborhoods: Centro, Aldeota, Iracema Beach, Meireles,
Mucuripe, Varjota, Papicu, City 2000, Cocó, Patriolino Ribeiro,
Dionísio Torres, Joaquim Tavora, Fatima, Jose Bonifacio,
Benfica, Farias Brito. (See map in pictures)


Points of Interest: Malls: Iguatemi, Rio Mar Papicu, Aldeota,
Del Paseo, Benfica. Fashion Center, Portugal Square, Iracema
Beach, Central Market, Unifor, Beira Mar.


Try TopBus and discover new ways to come and go, where
sharing is for more! Going back and forth, the best way. Come
with TopBus!


Let us know what you think! Rate our app and comment.
Questions? Send an email to:
atendimento@topbusmais.com.br

apps.title: Key West Rides
apps.description:
Key West Rides makes it easier than ever to move around Key West — with a few taps, book a ride using the app and we’ll pair you with others headed your way. 

How does Key West Rides work?
- Key West Rides is an on-demand travel concept that takes multiple passengers heading in the same direction and books them into a shared bus. Using the app, input your address and we’ll match you with a vehicle going your way. We’ll pick you up on a nearby corner and drop you off within a short walk of your chosen destination. Now for the clever bit; our algorithms provide journey times that are comparable to a taxi and much more convenient than other modes of travel, making on-demand transportation easier than ever before!

What we’re about:

SHARED.
Our tech matches people headed in the same direction. This means you’re getting the convenience and comfort of a private ride with the efficiency, speed, and affordability of a public one.

SUSTAINABLE.
Sharing rides reduces the number of vehicles on the roads, bringing down congestion and CO2 emissions. With a couple of taps, you get to do your part to make your city a little bit greener and cleaner, every time you ride.

AFFORDABLE.
Rides are priced comparable to public transport and you can add people to your bookings for even less.


Questions? Reach out to kwdot@cityofkewyest-fl.gov.
Loving your experience so far? Give us a 5-star rating. You’ll have our eternal gratitude.

apps.title: Rekab Solutions Company
apps.description:
On demand travel when you need it, where you need it.

Just download the Rekab app today, book your seat and go where you want, when you want. It is as easy as click and go.

Our intelligent service allows passengers to share their journey with others going their way. Book a journey and our powerful algorithm matches you with a premium vehicle that will pick you up at a convenient spot. Rekab is a new model of on-demand transport - a technology-enabled vehicle that comes to you, when and where you need it.

Where does Rekab operate?
To know about that, please contact Rekab customer service on 920000354 or at Support@rekab.sa.


How does Rekab work?
- Rekab is an on-demand travel concept that takes multiple passengers heading in the same direction and books them into a shared vehicle. Using the Rekab app, input your address and we’ll match you with a vehicle going your way. We’ll pick you up and drop you off at your requested destination. Our smart algorithms provide journey times that are comparable to a taxi and much more convenient than other modes of travel.

How long will I wait?
- You'll always get an accurate estimate of your pick-up ETA before booking. You can also track your vehicle in real time in the app.

How many passengers will I share a vehicle with?
- The number of passengers you will share a journey with varies based on capacity and your chosen destination!

Try this new on-demand transport app that is guaranteed to change the way that you think about travelling. We look forward to seeing you on your next journey. Just click and go!

Love our app? Please rate us! Questions? Email us at [SAPTCO.bus@kaust.edu.sa] for KAUST or [Support@rekab.sa] for other services.

apps.title: Cherriots LIFT
apps.description:
Scheduling a ride with Cherriots LIFT just got easier. With just a few taps you can schedule a ride, set-up notifications, and even track your ride in real-time as it approaches.

Cherriots LIFT is an origin-to-destination ADA transportation service for people whose qualifying disability prevents them from using the Cherriots Local buses. Contact the Cherriots team for questions on eligibility and visit the Fares and Passes page for information on how to buy LIFT passes.

All Cherriots LIFT vehicles are ADA-accessible.

Questions? Contact us at LIFT.Support@cherriots.org or 503-315-5544. You may also book a ride or view/cancel your existing reservations online, at https://cherriots.app.ridewithvia.com/

Creating community connections

apps.title: JR Transportation
apps.description:
Welcome to the all-new JR Transportation Mobile App. Requesting your next ride Just Got Easier. 

Introducing the "The All in One" Car service app. 



Just open the app and create a personalized profile or you can login via Facebook or Gmail. The app will request to obtain your location, so your driver knows where to pick you up.

You'll see your driver's profile information, vehicle details, and track your driver via our virtual real time map. Payments can be made by credit card of choice or cash. 
While waiting for your driver you can browse our entertainment section. You can now use our mobile app for all your travel needs and be entertained at the same time. 



Use our entertainment features while you wait for your driver:

- Create Profile
- Make A Trip
- Reserve A Trip
- View Trip History
- View Driver Profile
- Rate Driver Performance
- Listen To Our English Music Collection While You Wait
- Top Latin Mixes and Singles Collection While You Wait
- View Local News
- Browse Nightlife Events Around You
- Browse Businesses Around You 
- View Recommended Restaurants
- Browse Social Medias and More.

apps.title: Mobility by Ecolane
apps.description:
Ecolane's Self Service mobile app allows passengers from participating agencies to manage their transportation from the convenience of their smart phone.

-	Flexibility to Manage Trips
             - 	Empower riders with direct access to review and manage their trips
             - 	View upcoming and completed trips, easily cancel trips 

-	Convenient Trip Details View
             - 	Passenger notifications with accurate vehicle ETAs, reduce wait time 
             - 	Ability to follow bus on a visual map to see exact location

-	Simple Mobile Interface
             - 	24/7 access to account profiles, settings and reservations
             

NOTE: Access to some features will depend on the service guidelines for your individual transportation agency.

raw_data.releaseNotes:
Bug fixes and Improvements:
- Resolved issue where, when a client has a self-service account with address allowed set to no, the client was able to book a trip using POI addresses from their client profile and recently used addresses from recent trips they have taken.
- Resolved issue where rating a trip was not returning the user to the Past Trips screen.
- Resolved issue where screen titles were not always displayed at the top of the screen.
- Resolved issue where the log out button returned the user to the home page instead of logging out as expected.
- Resolved issue where deep linking failed if app was not already installed.
